Mike, Ben, and Sara are as close as three siblings can be. They do everything together and have limitless curiosity. This is primarily because their father, Frank, is a famous inventor. His latest invention, the matter minimizer, is stored in the basement oddly enough with the children's toys. The carefree trio make their way into the basement. Ben and Mike are sitting on the floor playing with their transformers, while Sara picks up and oddly shaped box. She pushes a red button on the side of the box and their is suddenly a bright flash.

As her vision returns she notices her brothers have gone missing. Little does she know her brothers are running towards her, but at a quater of and inch tall it takes awhile to get there. Sara calls out to them and it sounds like thunder. In a panic she presses the button again. When her vision clears for the second time she sees her brothers again, but the room has become enormous, and the box has been smashed to pieces from being dropped.

1111121222.content:
Dana smiled as she felt the bugs struggling under her foot. She has crushed many a bug in her time but she just couldn't understand why feeling these ones struggling made her feel wet between her legs. She added pressure slowly to make the feeling last longer. Eventually she heard and felt the wonderful pops of their little bodies as she grinds and twists her foot for good measure. She was in complete ecstasy. She didn't understand why but neither did she care as she finally let her foot lay flat on the carnage beneath her. After standing in it for another good five minutes she finally hops into the tub and masturbates to the previous moments. After an intense orgasm, she cleaned herself up and got out. She looked down at the small smear she had made of the bugs and smiled as she took a piece of toilet paper and wiped up the mess. She left the bathroom to see Frank kneeling by the trashcan with disappointed look on his face. "What's wrong dear?" she asked. "Did you happen to break anything while you were cleaning?" he answers with a question of his own. "No, but I believe the children may have. Why?" she asks curiously. "I was afraid of that. The machine parts in here were originally a shrink gun, and by the looks of it I believe it has been recently fired. I don't know about you but I haven't seen hide nor hair of any of them. I think they may have been shrunk." He stated sadly. "Oh dear, how small?" she asks worriedly. "This gun only shrinks things to one size. They would be no bigger then ants. Now, I don't think you managed to get them while cleaning and I don't think they would separate so if you see three strange looking bugs, you should assume it's them." He explained. Dana's eyes went wide as she remembered the bugs in the bathroom. However instead of crying or even a look of sadness, the wetness between her legs grew and an sick grin crossed her face. She quickly hid the grin and said " Well that's horrible, what do we do?" she asks with false concern. "You should probably get dressed and try to watch your step. For now I'll look around and see if I can find them." he responds as he starts looking around. "Okay dear, good luck." she says as she heads upstairs not watching her step. As she head up the second flight to their room, she couldn't hold back that sick smile anymore and began to giggle maniacally. Upon entering the room she locked the door and headed to the bed and lay down to one again masturbate. She knew this wasn't right, but no matter how hard she tried she just could feel any regret for what she did. Unknown to her, the memory of what she did in that bathroom was going to lead to many more masturbation sessions and orgasms as it becomes her favorite memory. She would eventually get her hands on a perfected version of the devise, but that is another story because for her kids this story has come to an untimely...
End.

111112212.content:
A broken down Mike finds himself on his knees, wailing into his open palms at the loss of his two siblings. His darling little sister Sara, who died at the heel of their enormous mother, and his brother Ben who died by the simple motion of her mothers foot shifting. His body being ground into a pulp for too small to see for a normal person but too disfigured for the likes of Mike to even tell what it once was. Wait a second, was it really wise to be crying at this moment? This would seem to be Mike’s train of thought as he looked up, luckily for him his mother hasn’t moved an inch. For his fallen sister and brother he must survive this. That thought alone was enough to give him the strength to stand, the strength to wipe away his tear covered cheek and eyes. Those very eyes now wiped away of the tears of grief lock onto the very big toe that took the life of Ben. It towering over him making him feel even smaller, being able to tell each and every detail in it that was impossible to see to the naked eye of the normal person. Mike could literally see the dust of the filthy basement circling around her feet. The littlest movement would send dust towards him and into his puny lungs making him cough a major fit.

“I have to get her attention somehow……but I’m so small, I bet even an ant is a 50 foot monster to me.”

Mike speaking to himself now, possibly showing a bit of insanity starts to boil with in his mind at its current fragile state. Still not quite developed still asking itself just how his mother could be doing this, no matter how many times that he reminded himself of the fact she didn’t know he still couldn’t help bust ask himself. What would do away this train of thought would be a loud clanking sound, one that threatened to deafen poor little Mike. Strangely enough for this speck sitting next to a monolithic toe of his own mother, the sound appeared to come from behind him. If that wasn’t enough an even weirder occurrence would take over. A shadow, Much like one that you’d find from a chain link fence but this pattern was strange.

“What the?”

Mike soon turned around to one hell of a sight to behold. Just as the shadow portrayed he was faced with fence, a golden fence. If that wasn’t bad enough on its own this fence stretched up into the sky. Mike wondered what it was, this even if it was a fence was defiantly a strange sight, as if it was a fence around the mansion of Kate Beckinsale to keep the paparazzi out and in elegant fashion. Wait a second, Mike vaguely started to remember this pattern he saw before him. That was the pattern he saw on his mothers ring finger not to long ago when she gave him five dollars after he begged for it. “No, it can’t be” was the constant thought he had as he looked on not really denying deep down. Afterall how could anyone even deny the existence of Santa Claus or even the Easter Bunny after what he’s been through today.

“MY RING.”

The sound of his Mothers voice was usually a comforting sound, but when your mother seems to have the voice of Zeus, that is enough to shake even the toughest man to his core. That it did to the speck that is Mike. The sheer power of her voice even at a normal tone was enough to unsettle the dust particles at her feet. Some even getting wedged into the ridges of her toes. Mikes eyes then scaled up his mother. Up that mountainous Toe and up her shapely legs, far, far up those legs met an even shapelier waist covered up by tight shorts. Then up her toned bare stomach and then up to those unimaginably enormous breasts covered by a tank top straining to restrain them. Mike always admired his mother’s body, not in an incestful way but in the sense that she still looked good for her age. Mike’s journey with his eyes would end as his eyes scanned over her gorgeous face with her blonde hair partly covering it. And those eyes, The beautiful blue eyes of his mother……looking down on him?

“Surely she can’t see me at this size?”

His heart nearly jumped out of his face, stricken with fear but then he started to think about it. Perhaps this was what he needed, for his mother to notice him. Though that thought was crushed when he saw that foot he was next to lift off the ground, once again the dust moving but from the quick motion it was slung inwards following her foot up before slowly drifting down back onto the ground. Sort of like watching leaves in the fall, The leaves falling from trees and slowly drift down onto the grass. A truly hypnotizing sight, But then again I don’t think people who loved to watch leaves fall from trees ever were covered in a state sized shadow.

“OH MY GOD SHE DOESN’T RECOGNIZE ME, SHE’S GOING TO STEP ON ME!”

Mike’s shouts feel upon deaf ears, as his mother’s dirty sole hovered above him. He knew he had one last chance at survival, he had to make it to his mothers ring for survival. Certainly his mother couldn’t step on him if he were inside it. With that in mind he starts his mad dash towards it while as he could hear his mothers laughter from up above. Soon followed by the earth rumbling voice of her after wards.

“AHH THE LAST OF YOU BUG’S HAHA IT’S TIME FOR YOU TO JOIN YOUR FRIENDS, HEY WAIT WHAT ARE YOU DOING? ARE YOU TRYING TO STEAL MY WEDDING RING? TSK TSK WHAT A NAUGHTY BUG”

Her laughter would continue as she then started to lower her sole, Mike being able to actually hear it as it lowered. The sole making an original sound as it pushed the air out from underneath her foot as it lowers towards her speck sized son who she’s mistaken for just a pesky ant.

11112.title: Smart Bugs?

1111211.content:
Dana was utterly confused. As she stared down onto the floor below her, it seemed to be that these tiny bugs were. . spelling out the word. . help? What did this mean? It couldn't be. . she didn't just see that. It was impossible. The impossibly tall woman thought she must have been going crazy.


“HA HA HA HA!!” Dana laughed, bringing her hand towards her forehead as she tried to make rational sense of this. Turning around, she looked away from them. As she did this, Mike, Sara, and Ben looked at each other in silence, unsure of what to do next. They seemed to have reached her, but. . they weren't sure if they had, or she had thought something else. From the children’s perspective, they watched as Dana’s incredibly long tower like legs lifted up into the air, stepping away from them. They started to back up as the weight slammed down onto the hard floor, heavily impacting it from their point of view.

WHAAAMM!!!

Again, Dana lifted her other foot up and took another step, lifting her feet high into the air. With little care of what was below her, she slammed down again onto the hard tarmac.

WHAAAAMM!!

“What is wrong with her, Mike!?!” Ben asked his brother, all of the children looking incredibly perplexed. Mike didn't even look at Ben, his eyes focused on Dana, wanting to watch what direction she took.

“I’m not sure. . she might just be. . confused or something.”

This just. . just wasn't possible. It was like. . like these bugs could understand her. That was. . . that wasn't possible. Moving her massive tree trunk legs back towards the bugs, Dana stared down at them again. The tiny specks on the ground stood there still, not moving away. Just standing there. What kind of bugs just. . stood there. Sure, ants would do that all the time, but beetles, roaches, and other bugs scurry when approached by another predator. Also. . these bugs looked really weird. They were so tiny that it was hard to make out but. . she had never seen bugs like this.

“OH GOD!!! I HAVE TO BE OUT OF MY MIND!! I’M ABOUT TO DO THIS!! I’M ABOUT TO TALK TO BUGS!! OK, LITTLE BUGS ON THE GROUND!! DO IT AGAIN!! I MUST BE CRAZY. . BUT IF YOU CAN DO THAT AGAIN. . JUST. . JUST DO IT AGAIN!!” Dana said, thinking herself crazy.

She must have been getting ill or something but. . she just had to see it for herself. She had to know if these bugs really did . . have sentient thought.

Mike, Sara, and Ben moved themselves into position again, forming their bodies into crude version of the word ‘help’. This time from further away, she had a harder time making out the letters. From up close, it was more obvious what they were doing. Yet, Dana, with her hand on her chin, realized that these bugs. . had listened to her.

“STOP, STOP, STOP!!” the gargantuan woman shouted raising her hands up into the air. She put her hands back onto her head again. . as the bugs stopped moving!!

“Mom has to know we aren't bugs now!!” Sara said, happily. Mike kept a close eye though. With how strange his mother had been acting, he still wasn’t sure about this. The room filled with terrifying laughter as Dana fell on her knees.

“AH HA HA HA HA!!! BUGS!! BUGS THAT. . THAT LISTEN!!! HA HA HA HA HA HA!!!”

The kids were unsure what to even do at this point. On the plus side, she had stopped trying to kill them, but on the downside. . she seemed to have gotten a little crazy. The children watched as their planet sized mother rolled back and forth on the floor, getting dirt and. . other stuff on her. Pushing upward on the floor, while her bottom and legs lay prostrate on the ground, she watched them as her t-shirt fell down a bit. . revealing some of her cleavage.

“OKAY. . OKAY!! ENOUGH GAMES!! BUGS!! HEAR MY COMMAND!!” Dana said in a regal tone, like she was a queen or monarch. Motioning her fingers to the left of the ‘bug pile’ she pointed a little ways away.

“GO LEFT OVER THERE!!” The great goddess commanded. Moving quickly, Mike, Sara, and Ben rushed to the left where their mother had pointed. Dana’s eyes grew large with happiness as she saw them obeying.

“WOW!! YOU . . .YOU CAN REALLY UNDERSTAND ME?!? THAT IS JUST. . .WOW!!! FRANK MUST HAVE. . HAVE INVENTED YOU GUYS!! INTELLIGENT BUGS!! I. . I WONDER IF YOU CAN TALK TOO!! WELL, IT DOESN'T MATTER. . YOU ARE FAR TOO SMALL TO BE HEARD!!”

Dana looked at them, still shocked at the realization of it all.

“I. . I COULD HAVE YOU GUYS DO SO MUCH STUFF!! LIKE. . I COULD TAKE MY SHIRT OFF. . AND. . AND HAVE YOU RUB MY BACK OR SOMETHING!! YOUR SO SMALL THOUGH. . I WOULDN'T EVEN BE ABLE TO FEEL YOU!!”

The kids stood silently, quaking in fear as the room trembled from her roarous laughter again. . penetrating their ears. Ben walked over to Mike. “Hey, maybe. . maybe we should. . leave her alone.” Mike shook his head at this suggestion. Bringing Ben close to him so he could whisper in his ear, he started to explain.

"Listen, what other chance do we have? Even if Dad did somehow get down here, we'd need to convince him too that we weren't bugs. Plus, look at Sara."

The two boys looked at their sister, who had tears in her eyes, totally afraid of her own mother's potential rage. Mike and Ben shook their heads in agreement and awaited what Dana would do next.
1111211.title: Confused Goddess

11112111.content:
Dana was still shocked at this. Here she was on the precipice of discovery, intelligent bugs that would listen to whatever she asked. Getting herself off of the floor, she carefully dusted herself off, as she was lost in thought. Bringing her hands up to her face, she started to rub her eyes. Blinking a few times, she looked up and down, away from where the 'bugs' were at. Then, moving her face over towards them, she saw them, still just standing there not trying to get away.

"OKAY, I NOW I KEEP ASKING FOR THINGS BUT. . BUGS, MOVE OVER TO THE RIGHT A BIT!!" Dana commanded pointing to the right. To her astonishment, the little tiny bugs started to make their way to the right!! Unbelievable!! It was impossible, yet. . here it was. Bugs that would do her bidding.

On the one hand, something was wrong though. And not just with her head like she initially thought. Frank had always been very careful where he put his inventions. Even though he had his things all over the place, he would never put anything that important in a place like this. His new inventions always went on his lab table over in the corner. Old inventions were always placed in special storage containers. See, if the kids were to mess with something or. . who knew. . they might have crushed these bugs like she almost had.

Something was wrong. Dana just wasn't sure what, yet.

From down below, the kids looked up in terror at their looming mother who rose overhead.

"Mike, listen, we need to get her to look closer at us!!" Mike turned his head over to the left where his brother Ben had grabbed onto his shoulder. Wiping away a little sweat on his forehead, he nodded in agreement. They would need to work together to get their mother to look more closely at them. Calling out to his sister, the three started to discuss a set of motions.

Dana's head was still in the clouds, thinking of all the potential things that this invention could create. Super accurate surgeries or maybe small sub atomic particles beyond the scope of the average eye. Plus. . they would make so much money. Frank may have been a smart inventor, but Dana had never seen him make anything super successful before. This could be their ticket to the good life. Scratching her chin a bit, Dana noticed the 'bugs' moving again.

"WHAT ARE YOU LITTLE GUYS DOING?!?" Dana asked inquisitively, watching as they started to make circles around each other.

BOOM!!!

BOOOM!!!

BOOOOM!!!!

Sara screamed as Dana's foot steps got very close again.

"Don't stop moving, Sara! We have to show that we are not afraid of her!!" Mike yelled, a little worried himself. Mike was walking around a little circle that his little sister Sara was making in the center of the floor, while Ben circled him and Sara simultaneity. The goal was to make a little bullseye so she would hopefully realize that she needed to look closer. . although Mike knew that a bullseye had. . other negative connotations too.

Mike looked up at his giant mother who had now put her hands on her hips, looking down with a smile.

"WOW, YOU GUYS ARE REALLY AT IT, HUH?!? I DON'T KNOW WHAT THIS ALL MEANS BUT. . YOU GUYS ARE GOING TO COME WITH ME, NOW!! OKAY?!?"

Ben screamed as he saw his giant mother's enormous bare foot move forward, very close to where he was at!! He fell down as her enormous bare foot collided with the hard ground, throwing him down onto the floor. Looking up at the enormous foot, he could smell her strong pungent odor emitting from her foot. Ben coughed, overwhelmed at just how immense she was.

"Ben!! Get closer!!" Mike screamed, his hands on his sister's shoulders as he huddled her close to him.

Ben quickly got onto his feet and started running over towards his other siblings. Reaching them, he turned to look and saw that the reason his mother hand done this, was to get herself in a position where she could bend down. With one foot forward and the other resting on the ground, Dana carefully kneeled herself towards her 'bugs', her enormous outstretched hand coming towards them.

Now that all three children were pushed together, the three children watched as the colossal hand slammed down besides them, almost knocking them over again. Now, right in front of them, was Dana's big pointer finger.

"OKAY BUGS!! START CLIMBING ON!! AND HOLD ON TIGHT!!! I DON'T WANT YOU FALLING!!" Dana said with a small giggle. She just imagined how scary it must have been for them, falling thousands of feet to their doom.

The children obediently started to climb up their mother's huge finger, working together to help each other move up. Dana could not see what their progress was, but she also couldn't feel them to well either. They were so tiny, it was barely even registering for her.

"ALL RIGHT!! I'M GOING TO START STANDING UP NOW!! I HOPE YOU ALL ARE READY!!"

Mike and Ben had made their way up, but Sara was still struggling!! Reaching down for their sister, they quickly pulled her up, right when Dana started to move her enormous hand upward. The quick shift, launched Sara off of the finger entirely!!

"Sara!!" Mike screamed watching his tiny sister fly through the air. Sara landed in the palm of Dana's hand, though.

"I. . I'm o-okay!!" Sara yelled back, looking for something for her to hold onto.

Dana had her hand stretched out entirely, being careful not to move too much. Her hand was a tiny bit shaky, just because she was thinking too much about not shaking. Luckily, even though it was quite frightening going up, the three children were fine as Dana brought them towards her immense face.

"AH, I SEE YOU ARE ALL STILL WITH ME!! GOOD!! LET'S GO OVER TOWARDS. . "
11112111.title: Dana has them do more things.

choices: He is okay, but trapped and needs our help!!"
111121111.content:
". . THE KITCHEN TABLE!!" Dana said proudly.

The giant woman turned her face and looked over towards Frank's workshop. Lying on it, was a magnifying glass, some other tools, and her cell phone which she had left over there when she first began cleaning up. Looking back at her 'bugs' she noticed that one of them had fallen onto her palm.

"OH, HOW CUTE!! DID YOU FALL ONTO MY BIG HAND?!? WELL, WE STILL HAVE A WAYS TO GO. . SO DON'T GO FALLING OFF!! I'LL TRY AND BE CAREFUL BUT IF YOU GO OVER. . IT'S YOUR FUNERAL!! HEH HEH!!!"

With that laugh, Dana started to lower her hand where her 'bugs' remained in the palm of her hand. The Mike and Ben held tightly to Dana's fleshy finger. Sara, however, could not see anything to really grab onto!! Before she could do anything else, Sara found herself falling over again as the massive titaness made her way over to Frank's table.

"Ben!! Help me!!" Sara screamed

Ben watched as his sister flailed back and forth in the palm of his giant mother's hand. Her little body went to and fro, as she struggled to hold on to any part of the skin. As Dana took another massive step, Sara flew forward, almost flying off of her hand completely. As luck would have it, she was able to grasp onto the crease between Dana's thumb and the palm of her hand. Ben only watched, fearful of what to do next.

"Mike!! We. . w-we have to help Sara!!" Ben screamed, a few tears forming in his eyes. He was terrified of the thought of his little sister plummeting to her doom. Mike looked at him and shook his head in agreement.

"I know, Ben!! But. . b-but I . . I don't know what we can do until Mom stops moving!!" He said, as he himself tried with all of his might to keep himself from flying around too. The kids were in a true state of panic that in reality, only lasted a few seconds as Dana finally made it to the table. Pushing the chair back with her right foot, Dana haphazardly plopped down into the chair, her body crashing into the seat. The action was too much for the kids, however.

"Whaaaa!!!" Screamed the three children in unison as they had flung upwards and away from Dana's big hand. Their eyes grew wide as they saw their mother's hand coming back to grab them very quickly.

WHAM!!

The three children all landed on the middle part of Dana's palm. They had struck her hand a bit hard, actually. Ben sat up first, still stunned at what had happened. He landed on the left part of her right hand where it was squishier. The skin had absorbed the blow, so he was okay. Before he could react and see what had happened to his siblings, he felt the whole world start to shake again!! The hand was . . tilting!! She was. . she was putting them onto the table!!

Ben rushed down his mother's palm like a giant slide, landing briskly onto the hard wooden surface. The tiny boy skimmed up and down, his body acting like a slide as he whished forward. His head still shaking, he tried to stand up, but was far too dizzy to do so. He still didn't know how his other siblings were and he was still worried that one of them had been badly injured. With his head finally slowing down, Ben got himself up quickly, as he looked up to see their giant mother fiddling with some of Frank's tools. He wasn't sure which thing she was getting just yet, but he didn't care. He really needed to see how the rest of his siblings were doing.

"Ben!!" Ben heard yell out to him from a distance.

Turning over, he saw that in the distance was his sister, Sara. Ben took in a breath of relief. She was okay. Now they just needed to get Mike and everything would be alright. As Ben approached his sister, she ran at him and hugged him tightly, pulling on his arm after the hug.

"Hurry, it's Mike. . he. . he"
111121111.title: On top of their Dad's wood. . .en table

1111211112.content:
The two children rushed across Frank's table in the basement as they thought surreptitiously about their brother. After everything they had been through, Ben wouldn't allow his brother to be killed. He just wouldn't.

As the kids rushed over, Dana was still playing around with Frank's things. As she did this, she suddenly stopped a moment, like a deer who notices an oncoming car. She froze, looking down at her little 'bugs' rushing across the table.

"OH YOU GUYS!!" She said playfully, wagging her finger at them, "YOU SURE DO LIKE PLAYING AROUND THEIR ON THAT TABLE, HUH?!?" As she spoke, a loud growl was heard emitting from the kids giant mother. Dana brought her hand down and rubbed her stomach a bit.

HEY!! WAIT A MINUTE!! HEH HEH. . I THINK EARLIER I SAID I'D TAKE YOU TO THE KITCHEN TABLE!! I THINK I MUST HAVE HAD FOOD ON MY MIND!! WELL, LOOK!! YOU GUYS UNDERSTAND ME WELL, RIGHT?!? YOU JUST HANG OUT HERE, I'LL GO UPSTAIRS FOR A BIT AND BE RIGHT BACK!! OKAY?!?" She said with a smile as she reached for the table and pushed it with her giant hands.

Ben and Sara fell over as the whole table was thrust forward, giving their mother room to stand up again. The two watched as she boomed away, making her way towards the stairs.

"Ben. . " Sara said, a little fear in her voice, "I'm. . I'm kinda. . kinda glad that. . t-that Mom isn't here anymore."

Ben looked at her, fear still gripping her voice and physical appearance. After all of that. . he was actually glad too. The boy shook his head as he helped his sister up and they continued making their way towards their brother.

. . .

Mike was stuck. His sister had run to go get help, even though he yelled at her to stay right there. He heard, just like his siblings had that their mother had went to go get some food. Still, he wasn't exactly in a good place himself. Looking around, he saw that he was stuck in the wreckage of one of his dad's old inventions. Which one, he wasn't sure. It was old and rusty, and a big socket had got him slightly stuck underneath his body. It was only for the fact that the socket was tilted that had kept him from getting crushed by it. That is why he wanted Sara to stay here. If she had just tilted him a little, he could have broken free already. What was worse too, was that with their Mom moving the table, the socket had started to shift in his general direction. . the weight starting to increase.

Trying with all of his might, Mike attempted to pull himself upward and out of the socket.

No use. It didn't even budge. Wait. . no, maybe a little but. . more towards them than away. Mike was a little scared. He didn't want to die.

"Mike!!" Mike heard as his two siblings rushed over towards him. He breathed a sigh of relief. He had been worried that they wouldn't come back to help him. The two siblings went over and carefully looked at the socket. With Mike now helping them, the two other siblings were able to pull Mike out. . freeing him from his prison.

"Whew, thanks guys!" Mike said, a smile on his face.

BOOOM!!!!

The kids froze as the table and everything on it shifted. Something. . something was coming down the stairs.

BOOOM!!!

The socket that Mike had been under slammed downward due to the shift in weight. Mike swallowed as he looked at the wreckage collapsed. . realizing that only moments ago. . that could have been him. The three kids ran away from all of Frank's old stuff, worried that something else might fall down.

BOOOOM!!!!

The kids fell down again, though this time as they rose they could see it in the distance. It was. .
1111211112.title: Mike in Peril

11112111121.content:
BOOM!!

BOOM!!

BOOM!!

The children again huddled closely together as they were still a bit unsure of what would happen next. Dana stepped off of the stairs and pointed her head over towards where the 'bugs' were at. She had changed her clothes and was now wearing a small tight tank top which showed off a little bit of her cleavage and a pair of blue jean shorts. She stomped loudly as she walked over to play with Frank's invention.

"OKAY, LITTLE BUGS!! NOW. . ."

“Now, just wait there princess. The invaders will be here soon.” Dana smiled. Before Sara could react, the giantess grabbed her husband’s hand and pulled him to a spot where the small girl couldn’t see them.

The woman immediately kissed her husband and started to make out with him. She felt excited about this. Dana would finally get to live alone with Frank again. Her man stopped her and smiled.

“Now darling, don’t you think we should wait until after the invasion? After all, there’s a princess than thinks she’s better than the queen.” Frank winked, making Dana giggle.

“Oh my. We can’t allow that, my king. Let’s go deal with this little girl right now.”

“Yes, my queen. Do you have a plan of attack?” Frank asked. Dana smiled with an idea.

They stop and see Ben far away, running toward them waving while his arms.

Seeing tiny Mike run toward her out of the corner of her eye, Dana notices Mike and Sara standing nearby and bites her lip, smiling wickedly.

Mike and Sara wave their arms back, trying to get him to stop. "Ben, NO!!" they both yell at him.

Tears streaming, Ben continues to run at them. "Wait! Don't leave me!!"

Grinning with satisfaction, Dana gingerly lifts one dirty foot into the air, turns it in the direction of her quarry, and drops it.

SPLAT!!!

The loathsome sounds of bones grinding and organs exploding sound fills the air as Dana sets her weight entirely on her foot, grinding her sole into the floor to maximize the squishing between the fleshy base and toes. To her ears, the loud, sickening tearing and crunching sounds like slimy, titillating pops. Feeling oddly intoxicated, she runs her tongue over her lip. A tiny puddle of blood oozes out from beneath her foot...

Who got flattened?
1112.title: Sibling Squish

choices: she shrinks herself and her friends
11121.content:
Sara opens her eyes and glances at the squashed remains of her brother and begins to sob. Ben suddenly realizes what he's done, he has inadvertently caused his own brother's death. To make up for it, he must save his sister. While Dana is destracted grinding her foot into the reamins of her son, Ben runs over to his sister and quickly grabs her arm. The two siblings quickly run off.

Satisfied that she has crushed the impudent insect, Dana notices two other insects out of the corner of her eye. Feeling the need to have more insects squish beneath her destructive peds, she slowly makes her way over to them. The two siblings are trapped, but before Dana can raise her foot to squish them, she hears footsteps coming down the steps. She looks over to see some of the neighborhood children coming down. Jake 13, Greg 12, and Jena 11. They are all friends of her children. They ask her where they are and she says she's not sure but to they can welcome themselves to the toys until they show up. The mother leaves and Jena picks up the damaged shrinking device...
11121.title: Shrinking device not quite broken...

choices: Frank comes down the stairs in only a speedo..
Jeff (Mike, Ben, and Sara's 17-year-old cousin) comes down in only a towel...
111211.content:
Jena saw a flash, and then all went dark. After what seemed to be ages (when it really was about five minutes) she awoke. Her head seemed to hurt really bad."Uh...what happened." "Greg, Jake, wake up." She looked around, where were they? Everything here seemed a lot bigger.


"Sara, it'll be okay. We just have to find a way to get our parent's attention to change us back. We just need to be a little more careful." Out of the corner of his eye, he saw a large flash. He was curious to find out what the heck that was. "Hey Sara, c'mon. Anything is better than just sitting around here.
Sara ran with all her might and crashed into Jena with a full force hug. Oh Jena, its awful. We're shrunk...

What? Really. How?

The shrink ray, of course. But that's not the worse part, Mike's dead.

You have got to be kidding me? Jake said unenthusiatic

"Hey that's my line!" Jena exclaimed.

Would you guys stopped fussing over such a unimportant matter. Mom stepped on him.

On purpose?

No, she thought we we're bugs. But, that's not the worst part. Apparently, now we're 1/32 of an inch. That was what the machine was set on when I pressed the button. I'm surprised mom could see us, but there is hope. Yet, when dad demonstrated his machine to us...he told us there was a flaw.

And what flaw would that be?

We don't stay at that shrunken height; we'll keep get smaller. It won't be much of a difference to us, but with each passing second, we're getting smaller. I judge that we're at 1/64 of an inch now.

Are you sure?

There was a piece of aluminum foil on the ground, and I was just as tall as it is wide a minute ago.

Oh, man!

So, how do you propose we get out of here?

Just then, all five of the kids heard a thumping.

Oh no! hollered Ben.

What? said Jena.

Somebody's coming down the stairs! Ben said in that all to feeble voice.
111211.title: The Shrunken Mess

111212.content:
Jake and Greg suddenly disappear. Jena looks around for her two friends, but they are nowhere in sight. She begins to walk around the cold cement floor barefoot. Jena never did like wearing shoes and even though her feet would always get dirty she would ignore the comments from people telling her to put on shoes.

Meanwhile Jake and Greg find themselves starring up at the towering mountain that is their friend Jena. They hear voices behind them and see their friends Ben and Sara frantically waving them over. They're too confused to react and can only continue to look up in horror at their friend. They then look at her monstrous feet, each the size of 747s. They had never noticed how dirty they were, but now they have a different perspective.

Jena stops looking and assumes her friends have gone back up the steps to wait for Ben, Mike, and Sara. Before she joins them she notices two insects at her feet. Jena has always had disdain for insects and loved to feel them squish beneath her feet or spit on them and watch them drown.
111212.title: Jena - a mountain of a girl

choices: she decides to just step on them
1112121.content: "HMMM WHAT DO WE HAVE HERE...." Jena says with an evil smirk on her face. "GOD I HATE BUGS.... MMmmmH Mmh Mph" the last part of what she said was muffled because she was working up spit with her mouth closed the two at her feet look up puzzled at Jena as she looked down with her lips pursed. She dropped to her knees and the two 'bugs' fell to the floor from the shockwave she created all they could do was stare up in horror as enough spit to fill an olympic sized swimming pool came almost in slow motion from their friends mouth..... 'jena noooooooo!' it hit them with enough force to knock them both unconcious jena looks down upon them with that same evil smirk as she gets to her feet
1112121.title: Swimming lessons anyone?

choices: join up with their two friends Ben and Sara
11121211.content:
The two boys stuggle in the thick clear liquid. It is like a pool of translucent quicksand. Jena laughs at the two insects which to the two boys sounds like thunder. She raises her dirty sole above them and the boys cry out in terror. But instead of stepping down, she puts her foot back where it was. She is merely toying with them. She bends over and lowers her index finger into the pool. The giant fleshy tower swirls around the pool, creating a saliva whirl pool. The two boys are swirled around, not knowing which way is up. Jena giggles with glee.
"WELL, THATS ENOUGH TORTURE FOR YOU GUYS TODAY, MAYBE I'LL SEE YOU INSECTS AGAIN SOMEDAY, RIGHT NOW I HAVE TO FIND MY FRIENDS SEE YOU LATER." She walks away, her booming footsteps slapping the hard concrete floor.

The two friends have escaped the whirlpool and desperately plea for their giant friend to save them, but it is no use. So they...
11121211.title: Escaping the spit whirlpool

choices: stay to the side let them pass
grab hold of one of them
111212111.content: the two shake themselves off and head for the stair wondering how theyre going to make it up the huge cliffs they used to call stairs they manage to figure out a way to work together and climb up the first step they look down then up and realize gee.... only a few more thousand feet to go after about half an hour theyve made it half way up when the door opens and the sound of preteen female laughter can be heard the two stare as three girls start stomping down the steps one they dont know a blonde thin girl wearing a tight short t-shirt and tight jeans with high top converse on and looks like no socks behind her is Jena still in her same clothing and barefoot and the last is Melissa a 13 year old brunette shes one of those jail bait girls that looks like shes 18 already shes in a tight black shirt with an anarchy symbol in the middle huge jeans with 40 inch leg openings that engulf the black sponge flip flops that are slapping under her feet the two have little time to decide what to do

choices: the girls head for the basement
1112121111.content: The two barely make it to the side of the steps as the first pair of feet past but unfortunately when melissa passes her pants legs take up the entire step and the boys are pushed off the step and down to the one below it this time under melissas pants leg right next to her foot.... melissa stops looking down at the basement below "UHM GUYS ISNT THERE SOMETHING WRONG WITH THIS PICTURE.... NO ONES DOWN HERE" greg seeing a possible opportunity gets ready to jump on melissa's foot and get a ride to the top of the steps but do they decide to wait downstairs or go back up

Up up and away to find Mrs. Dana

Melissa decides her friend is right so she starts the rest of the way down the stairs the boys get swept by her pantleg to the step below and look up in horror as her foot comes slamming down they both shut their eyes and wait for the worst but the worst never comes all they hear is the slap of melissa's flip flop to her foot then the bang of her shoe hitting the step after the one theyre on shes taking the stairs 2 at a time the boys stand up and now theyre faced with yet another choice
11121211112.title: Down but not out

11121212.content:
The bubbling fizz of the saliva pool stings Jake and Greg's eyes, and they promptly regain awareness and start screaming, flailing around in the sticky blob trying to escape.

Jena bites her bottom lip smiling, her eyes wide with excitement. "Itsy bitsy bugs goin' for a little swim!" she giggles. Reveling in her power over these tiny creatures, she squats down, her stubby legs encircling the frothing puddle, and watches with anticipation as the two insects gurgle and writhe in her own spit.

Jake is choking on the acidic, sticky lake he's trapped in and goes under, his small fingers reaching weakly out from the surface. Too afraid to be concerned with saving him, Greg claws at the spit around his eyes, then starts swimming like mad to make it to the edge of the pool.

Suddenly he feels a hand grab his leg behind him and dig it's nails into his skin. He howls with pain and kicks at Jake, who is using him as leverage to pull himself up. Greg loses speed and is drawn back into the center of the foamy whirlpool. Jake manages to raise his head back out of the saliva and gags, gasping for air.

Too tired to start swimming again, Greg pulls more spit out of his eyes and looks up at Jena, her plump thighs bulging out over her calves and her hands limply hanging between them as she stares down over them, her sinister smirk overshadowed by her locks of blond hair. Greg raises his arm at her while sloshing around and pleads for mercy, hoping she'll recognize him. "Jena! You gotta help us!!"

Up above, Jena is getting bored. Her legs are stiff from squatting and the bugs are showing no signs of drowning. Sighing with dissatisfaction, she looks away from the pitiful Greg and slowly gets back to her feet. Greg's hope is shattered as he watches the giant Jena put her hands on her immense knees and stand up.

Jena peers down at the saliva pool between her feet, which is beginning to sink into the concrete and lose it's fizz. "I'm tired." she groans. "You stupid bugs are too stubborn to die." She thinks for a moment, then tips her one foot on it's heel, turning it inward until it's broad, soot-covered sole is pointing down at the puddle below her. "Guess I'll just have to squash you after all." she tells them nonchalantly.

Jake and Greg are both gripped by fear as the battleship-sized sole looms over them, casting a dark shadow over the entire pool and outward. The two friends both turn around and start desperately fighting the current, trying to get away. The dispersion of the spit foam makes it easier too see, but the mire is still full of floating cloud of snot and mucus, which clings to their arms and makes them heavy. They movements only cause the giant pond to swirl inward, sucking them in as they frantically swim for the edge.

Jena is amused by this as she curls her toes and grins. "What's wrong, Antsies?" she calls down mockingly, "Don't you wanna get out of the way before you get squished??" Gleefully she wiggles her toes and tips her heel back and forth, taunting the insects with the threat of her crushing foot toppling down on them.

Aching with exhaustion, Jake gasps and glances back at the foot towering over the pool, ready to drop at any moment. He turns away and continues to scramble for the edge, clawing his way to freedom. Greg has made greater progress and is almost to the edge...

"Time's up, buggies.", Jena snickers before she drives her heel forward, relishing what's to come. Everything goes black as Jake and Greg look up to see the colossal black sole of Jena, blocking out all view of the sky as it descends toward them. The criss-crossed wrinkles in Jena's fleshy foot, clogged with dust and dirt, tighten and deepen as she clenches her enormous toes.

Within moments the foot is so close to touching them they can smell the dirty skin hovering over their bodies. Greg raises his arms over his head and screams as the tremendous sole suddenly pushes down on him. He is quickly pushed under the water, his knees buckling from the incredible weight. Futily he pushes against the foot, his open mouth flooding with saliva as he wails. Above, Jena savors the feeling of his tiny body struggling against her skin.

Jake's escape is blocked just as he crawls out from the pool. Jena's toes, each the size of a semi truck, touch down on the cold concrete and enfold over his puny body like prison bars. He's soon gripped between the bulging, broad base of the foot and the smelly lining of the middle toes, which instinctively clamp together as Jena feels the bulge of her little friend wriggling within them.

Jena's foot is now pushing against the floor. Her flesh flattens out onto the saliva-soaked concrete, the spit pool spreading around and spurting out from beneath her bulk. The dark layer of grime under her sole mixes with the puddle of spit, creating a vile black mixture that fills every crack and wrinkle under her foot. Jena finds herself surprised by how little the sensation of her own spit moistening her foot bothers her.

Engulfed in an ink-like blackness, Greg can no longer stay above the water and is submerged. The saliva is quickly blackening around him as Jena's filthy sole dirties the pool. Unable to see his way out, Greg can only fumble and squirm beneath Jena's ever-increasing weight. His body is pushed against the wet concrete, and soon he finds his back being pressed hard into the floor by the descending flesh ceiling. Greg blindly grabs at the skin with his fingers but cannot hope to pry himself loose. He can feel the sheer, immeasurable pressure of the giant evil girl on top of him wreaking havoc on his body. His nostrils and eyes chocked with black spit, Greg gives in to his terror and with his las breath, opens his mouth and begins a long, silent scream...

Jena closes her eyes and bites her lip again as she feels the subtle squish of Greg's body directly beneath her sole, in the center of her foot. The tingle of various bursting arteries and snapping bones, one after another, tickle her skin.

Jake can hear the hideously loud squashing sound of Greg's body rupturing behind him. Although he's managed to fight his way out of the spit puddle, Jena continues to shift her weight further onto her compressing sole. The black spit mixed with bodily fluids starts to squirt out from the sole and flows under his legs. Soon it's seeping past his face like a the remnants of a wave crashing on the beach. Gripped by terror, he sees a small beam of light emerge from under Jena's big toe, which is raised slightly off of the ground, and immediately crawls after it. His bruised elbows ache with pain as he uses them to scramble out from under the wet, leathery prison.

Alarmed by the feel of Jake's body darting out from under her, Jena thinks fast and cuts her off by placing the butt of her big toe right on top of him. Jake winces and cries out as he is painfully wedged under the blunt toe of his ruthless friend.

For a moment Jena contemplates simply pressing her big toe down and squishing Jake that way. Jake grits his teeth as he feels the toe firmly flexing and relaxing, knowing it's Jena toying with how to dispose of him.

Jena looks down at her cute little toes, tightly pressed together and yearning to feel another big, juicy bug burst between them. Almost without thinking, Jena involuntarily clenches them and slides Jake's writhing body back beside her sole. Then, with Jake sticking out between her big and middle toes, Jena grips his body and begins to slowly squeeze...

The pain is intolerable for Jake, who screams aloud and climbs up just far enough to be able to look out over the landscape of Jena's foot. She watches helpless and in agony as the bony knuckles of the two toes begin to tighten and grind against one another like a vice. With each endless moment the pressure builds and builds, and he can feel her bones beginning to crack, and muscles beginning to tear, and...

SQUISH!!!

A disgusting eruption of blood and various fluid explodes between Jena's toes. Each successive pop indicates another exploding organ. A sticky, clumpy mess is all that is left of poor Jake.

Jena flashes a bright, carefree smile and sighs contently. "That was nice." she says to herself.

Dana's voice echoes from the stairwell and interrupts her daze.

"Jena? How long are you going to be playing down there? I made hotdogs for the three of you."

"Oh, coming!" Jena shouts, already forming excuses for where jake and Greg have gone in her mind. She's so glad she decided to tinker with that machine, now she's going to get some extra hot dogs out of the deal.

She raises her foot from the carnage splattered on the floor and heads upstairs, leaving a moist bloody trail behind her...
11121212.title: Dirty Sole Squish

choices: Jena doesn't see Ben and Sara
1112122.content:
Jena looks down at the bugs by her feet. Unfortunately for Greg and Jake, they
no longer have a say in this situation, and furthermore, their lives. Life and death is now solely dictated by the whim of an eleven year old girl. Immediately, and without thought, the decision is made to simply smash them.

Jake and Greg run for their lives as the enormous little girl lifts her massive bare foot - her cute little nose scrunched up in an expression of disgust.

Jena feels a small wet crunch as her foot lands, and she feels as if she's just won a fight. Ben and Sara watch from far below as she smugly wipes the squished remains on the edge of one of the basement stairs.
1112122.title: The actions of a child

11121221.content:
Jena, growing impatient, decides to go through Ben and Sara's toys while she's waiting for them to show up. There's not much there, but one of sara's barbie dolls catches her eye. It's the one she's always wanted, or at least for the past week. She glances nervously around the room, and, taking a step toward the stairs, stuffs it in her pocket.

Ben and Sara can only watch in disbelief as the giant thieving brat takes a lumbering step in their direction. They hold each other and scream wildly. Jena takes a second step, and this time, they're sure they will be crushed by the giant's pretty foot as it comes down on them with a pounding thump.

Jena stops in her tracks as she feels something tickle the instep of her bare foot. She lifts her foot, and as expected, finds two more tiny bugs on the floor.

Ben and Sara have no time to feel relief for not being crushed. A gargantuan foot is placed on either side of the tiny siblings, while their owner crouches above them, staring down.

Jena watches the bugs, amused by how tiny they are; knowing they have no chance of survival. She digs in her nose, as children often do, while trying to come up with a cruel way to snuff them out. She begins to roll a huge wet booger between her fingers when it hits her.

Ben screams as a huge finger lowers from the sky, but Sara can only watch, horrified by what her former friend is about to do.

Jena sadistically wipes her booger on the tiny insects, sticking them both to the floor. She giggles down at her handiwork; both bugs are trapped in a single booger.

The tiny siblings struggle and fight but they are hopelessly stuck in Jena's disgusting glob of mucus. Sara barely manages to keep her head above the surface, but Ben is completely submerged, and drowning fast. His poor little lungs are filling with snot, and it's not long before he goes limp, floating face down in a pool-sized booger. Jena's booger.

Sara screams for help, but the Goddess Jena hears nothing. She simply watches, amused by her power, as the little flea struggles. Sara manages to stay afloat, even as several seconds pass by, but unfortunately, Jena is satisfied. Done with her playthings, she steps on them nonchalantly, and leaves the basement. On her way out, she wipes her foot on the bottom step, and stomps up the staircase with her new barbie.

No one ever saw the kids again, and Jena didn't really care. She wouldn't have cared even if she knew that she had turned them into a smashed people-booger. She never really liked those kids anyway. In fact, they kind of bugged her.
11121221.title: Little Monster

choices: Ben decides to roam the house
Friends of Ben come over to visit him
11122.content:
Ben looks on in horror as his brother and sister are squished to pulp beneath his mothers awesome foot. To Ben the whole experience is in slow motion. As his mother's foot slowly moves back and forth he can see the muscles in her upper thigh shake from the impact of her foot. She lets a moan escape her lips, but to her miniature son it sounds like a deafening roar. Dana looks down at her son, thinking he's just one of three insects that must be squished. It almost seems as if their eyes meet but Ben knows thats impossible. She can't even see his face from her vantage point.

Y'KNOW INSECT, I DIDN'T THINK STEPPING ON YOUR FRIENDS WOULD FEEL SO GOOD. I'LL TELL YOU WHAT, I'M GOING TO SAVE YOU FOR LATER SO YOU'LL HAVE A LITTLE WHILE TO THINK ABOUT YOUR INSIGNIFICANT LIFE BEFORE I CRUSH YOU OUT OF EXISTENCE.

Ben falls to his knees in despair, how could his mother be so cruel? Even if she didn't know it was her own children, he never expected her to be so sadistic.
11122.title: Dead! Dead!  My bro and sis are Dead!

111221.content:
Ben runs with all his might. He sees a dresser in front him, and sprints under it.

"You can't escape from me you little bug. I will find you.:

Ben starts crying, hysterically. It would be impossible if he ever made it out of this. All alone, with no one to realize how small he is. Yet, he knows he must find a way out of here. In the pitch of the blackness, he sees something off in the distance.

**************************************************************************** ***********************

Meanwhile, Dana is getting frustrated. She is unable to find that last remaining bug. If I don't kill that bug know, who knows how many there will be in the future. Maybe Frank can help me. Dana calls Frank down to the basement to help her exterminate the bug.

"Honey, I have searched everywhere except under the dresser. I can't seem to reach. And you know how bugs can be."

"Since there is only a front entrance out of the dresser, I could block and stop the bug." Ben's dad positions himself against the dresser.

**************************************************************************** ********************
"Hey, a car! And it fits me." Ben exclaimed. The car was an red ferrari (a bit old and wrecked), but it was still good. It was odd, however, why dad would shrink a car.

"Oh well, at least I will be able to get away from mom's clutches and seek help. Ben notices some white stuff over the car. "Probably some wear," he thought.

He found the key right in the ignition slot. He had never driven before, so this would be a worthwhile experience. He started the car (which started like a mouse) and zoomed through the only entrance their was light. "Freedom!" Ben exclaimed.

The feeling of driving gave him a rush he had never ever felt. He forgot about what happened to his other siblings. He felt free like a bird, an eagle soaring through the skies, and then CRASH!

**************************************************************************** *******************
About two minutes later, Ben woke up. What happened? Where am I? He felt dizzy, hurt, and in pain. It seemed, as he recovered, that he had crashed into something.

Frank felt a slightly tingling between his thighs.

"Hey, honey I think it worked." Both he and Dana looked down into Frank's crotch and saw a speck. A very small speck.

Frank picked up everything between his thighs, and he brought it to his face for a closer look.

"Honey, this is no bug. The broken car is our safari (sex Ferrari) from our first sex night. And, and the little bug is Ben.

Ben?

Yeah, he seems to be injured. We have got to grow him back.

Hey, his lips are moving. He's trying to tell us something.

Frank brought Ben to his ear. Ever so quietly, he said that it was broken.

What?

The shrink ray is broken.
111221.title: Ben and Freedom

111222.content:
Minutes pass. As Ben weeps into his hands in his basement, the door to the backyard suddenly swings open with a dull, rusty creak.

Ben twirls around as a sharp rush of blustery wind blows into the room and hits him square-on. Oversized crusty leaves from outside blow in and dance across the floor, scattering all around him.
Ben covers his eyes and stares through his windblown hair at the doorway on the other side of the room and sees the silhouette of a little girl, her face clouded and blond pigtails glowing by a frame of blindingly white light.

The girl slowly takes a step inside and places her foot inside the doorway, craning her little neck as she cautiously peers in. Ben's heart jumps for joy; a rescuer has come!

After a moment, the girl lifts her other foot and steps fully inside. The rattling door slams with a crash behind her, and suddenly the room is darkened again.

Ben rubs his eyes and squints while his eyesight adjusts. Gradually he begins to make out features beneath the shadows of the girl's nose and eye sockets. She takes another step forward, her arms slightly lifted and hands hovering at her sides apprehensively. Bars of light beaming in from the nearby vent roll up her collarbone and onto her face. Ben gasps. It's Jena, the cute 11-year-old neighbor who visits all the time. Her big blue eyes scan the room from under her locks of golden hair. Her pink lips are pursed with uneasiness. She spots the twirling smoke emitting from the shrink machine and senses something's amiss.

She takes yet another step. The muffled clap of her sole against the frigid stone is heard.

Jena calls out for someone. "Heellooo?"

With a shout of relief Ben dashes toward her with arms outstretched. He's never been so happy to see---

Ben skids to a stop and falls on his back. As he ran over to Jena he was suddenly overtaken by how immense she was, and when he saw her gargantuan feet lying flat and encircling him, he fell over himself with shock.

Lying flat, Ben finds himself paralyzed, totally unable to move as he stares straight up at the once-little girl he knew. Although her height couldn't begin to compare with his mother's, all of a sudden Jena had become a mountain in her own right. Her short, stubby limbs were no less frightful to look at than Dana's own firm, toned ones. Jena's smooth, plump thighs scraped the sky above him as they loomed over her knees and reached all the way up into into her denim coveralls. Her tiny fingers now resembled giant, bus-sized sausages, curling against each other high into the air overhead.

Worst was her feet. Those adorable, chubby, tiny feet that Jena hated to stuff into rigid shoes or sandals, with broad bottoms that always squished against the pavement when they all played jumprope together, and the roundest toes with cute, glimmering nails she loved to paint flowers on. Jena's feet were probably the most innocent, dainty things you could ever lay your eyes on.

But now things were different. Those rows of charming little toes now sprawled out across the concrete landscape, pawing at it and flexing together so tiny folds of skin beside each toenail deepened with every clench. Her soot-covered soles laid flat against the floor, covering every inch in sight like and stretching off into the distance behind Ben like jetliners.

And the smell, the smell! As soon as Ben approached the giaint girl he was hit by the most head-swooning aroma of warm flesh that he had ever encountered outside of his sister's laundry hamper. All at once he imagined the sight of two wrinkled, slightly damp feet, just having emerged from the humid interior of a pair of girl's sneakers after an hour of harsh yellow sunlight beating against them on a hot afternoon, the heat mixing with that of sun-drenched sidewalk and creating a smoldering warmth against their soles...

The sound of Jena's foot raising it's heel off the ground and sliding backward against the floor fills the air like the sound of a wave on the beach. From directly below her Ben can only make out her chin, nostrils and tight, gap-toothed mouth as she cocks her head to her shoulder. Her massive foot continues to slide, barely avoiding grazing Ben's body and rests itself next to it's cousin, her broad heel hanging in the air and toes gently pressed against the skin of her other foot. She bends her knee slightly and puts her hand on her hip, striking her signature stance of doe-eyed bewilderment. The flesh of her sole compresses further against the floor and the skin along her knee squishes and creases as she shifts her body's weight onto the one leg.

Still gawking up at the amazonian child high above him, Ben barely has enough time to get to his feet when...
111222.title: The Girl Next Door

choices: Jena takes Ben to eat sandwiches
1112221.content:
Without warning, Jena takes her foot out from behind her other ankle and brings it around. There's a whirlwind of movement as a blur of skin whizzes through the air, and before Ben can even move Jena's heel is settled on the floor and is flattening out as her thick sole lowers itself toward him. Time slows down as Jena points her toes up and tilts her foot of death over the ant-like shape of Ben. The last things Ben sees are the crack-like wrinkles in the little giant's sole spreading open and a wall of orange flesh hurtling at him and then...

The force of the bare-bottomed sole hits him like a ton of bricks and everything goes black. The oxygen in poor Ben's lungs is knocked completely out and replaced by the moist wafting of little girl feet. The strong odor combines with the sudden crippling weight and he blacks out.

Jena's bites the inside corner of her mouth and stuffs her hands in her backs pockets of her overalls. She hasn't the slightest inkling she's got a tiny boy writhing under her foot and has her mind on other things. Like, where is Mike and Sara? Thoughtlessly she tightens her toes and taps them on the cool concrete below them as she looks around at the makeshift lab. Ben's minuscule groans cannot reach her ears and remain muffled inside the deep creases around him. Jena's foot flattens itself out below her and makes itself comfy on the hard floor.

"Jena?...Is that you down there??" The upstairs door has opened and Dana is calling down(She's used to Jena stopping by).

"Yes it's me." she answers cutely.

"Are the kids down there with you?" Dana hollers down the stairs.

"I don't see them, Miss Dana!"

"Well, come on upstairs. I'm making sandwiches." She leaves the door open and white light from the kitchen pours into the basement.

"I'll be right there." She forgets all about the weird machine in the corner and lifts her foot to go upstairs...

The trembling the of the floor rattles Ben's bones as is face is currently pressed into it. The firming of Jena's foot on top of him, which has pushed mercilessly down on his body like a warm ceiling of dark, smelly skin, grows harder as Jena shifts her monumental weight onto it. Just before hot light floods his eyes, Ben feels his body give and suddenly sink deep into the folds of Jena's sole with a loud sticky smack, and he feels something gooey and moist cling to his skin and hold him in place. He's helpless to move as Jena's slides her sole across the concrete surface and lifts it up, high into the air for seemingly miles, all in a matter of miliseconds...

Ben weakly opens his aching eyes and watches the gray floor cruise by under him. He wonders why he's not plummeting to the ground.

In fact, before Jena came here she mistakingly stepped on a wet glob of chewing gum stuck to the corner of the sidewalk. She ground her foot into the pavement and tried to scrap it off, but some gross sticky excess clung to the recesses of her soft wrinkles and now it's glued Ben firmly to her foot!

Jena dangles her foot almost mockingly in the air for a moment. Ben looks up and sees her toes clenching as it rises, tightening the skin around his body, then spreading and pointing out into the distance as the mega-sized girl swiftly brings her heel down. The floor rushes up in a flash and Ben is slammed face-first into the ground again. But he's dug so deep into the sweaty cracks by now that the impact is cushioned just enough by her pillowy sole to not seriously hurt him. Ben winces and grits his teeth he listens to the wet sounds of Jena's foot squishing all around him.
1112221.title: To crush and not know it

choices: Jena lifts her foot to the table and scrapes Ben off
11122211.content:
The tiny titan makes her thundering stride across the floor. Her padded feet slap the flat stone and drive poor Ben into it again and again like a hammer hitting a nail.

Jena's mind is on kisses from her "Auntie" Dana and tasty sandwiches, oblivious to the fact that she's setting the crushing bulk of her entire weight on her minescule friend with each step of her bare slapping feet. The pressure of her baby fat-laden legs and body is multiplied by a million when pressing down on a bug-sized boy like our hero. Over and over the floor hurtles toward his frail form and he is squashed underneath the little girl's fleshy foot only to be pulled back up for another round a second later. WHAM...WHAM...WHAM...

Jena sets her foot on the wooden stairs leading to the kitchen and leans onto it.

C..C..CCRRRRRRRRRREEEEEEEEAAAKK....

The creaky wooden step buckles immediately under the ponderous girl's toes and groans low. Ben can actually HEAR Jena's crushing weight push down on him and the splintering boards. His arms and legs now buried in the folds of Jena's murky sole, Ben is powerless to do anything but suffer as with each step Jena climbs higher and the gravity on her body pulls harder. Ben squeals from the intense pain as his head is pulled deeper into the embrace of Jena's hardening foot wrinkles. Dust and lint from the filthy steps cling to the underside of each foot, turning them even blacker than before.

CREEEAAK...POP...GROAN...The flimsy wood snaps and pops between her toes as Jena's weight increases.

Finally, she sets foot on the cool linoleum of the kitchen. The warm bottoms of her feet stick to the floor as she makes her way to the table. SMACK...SMACK...SMACK...

She pulls out a chair and sits her round little bottom on it. Ben is relieved as her feet slide out from under her weight, allowing the chair to take the load off. Dana walks over with a paper plate holding a single slice of white bread and sets in in front of Jena.

"I'll be right back in a minute sweetie. I'm almost done."

Dana smooches the girl's forehead and walks back to her cutting board. Jena waits patiently for her food, but feels something globby and sticky on her foot...
11122211.title: Argh! Stairs!

111222111.content:
The monstrous folds of Jena's smelly foot start to overtake a terrified Ben. Weak and scared of being crushed, Ben starts to squirm around inside the giantess's skin, but it's so tight and the living walls are so thick and greasy that he can't pull himself away!

Jena flexes and releases her toes under the table a few times, squishing her sole and feeling the large glob of gummy Ben wedged in there. She curls her lip in distaste and lifts her ankles up, grabbing it with both hands and lifting it to her face. She leans down as far as she can and squints her eyes at Ben.

Ben is so tired he is almost losing consciousness, but he can barely see out of the wrinkling tightening all around him up at the little girl's startlingly huge face.

Jena peers down at the soft cracks in her foot. The canyon in the middle is full of something sticky and dark. She bites her lip and scrunches her toes again to watch it squish and ooze through the web-like sole. Ben tries to claw his way out and reach out for Jena, but it's so tight in there...He tries to yell at the pair of shiny brown eyes. "Jena..." he almost whispers. "Help me..."

Of course Jena can't hear him. "Gross." says the unwitting giant. After squeezing her foot a few times, she decides the clogged wrinkles in her foot are too uncomfortable to leave alone anymore. She lifts her foot way up to the edge of the table and sets the small arch of her foot against it. She looks over to the next room where Mrs. Dana is busy bent over her vegetables. Her back is turned. Jena pushes on her ankle and drags her foot down HARD against the tabletop. The gummy substance within begins to scrape off...

"AAUUUGHHH!" Ben screams, but it's too late. The hard corner picks him up with the rest of the sticky yuckness, and he finds himself being pulled out from inside Jena's wrinkles and is spurted out into the air and onto...
111222111.title: Scraped off

choices: Miss Dana wants a bite or wipes Ben off Jena's lips
1112221111.content:
Ben is flung into the air, the force of Jena's movements freeing him from his sticky prison. He screams until all the air escapes his lungs. He flies so high that his body almost reaches the eyes of Jena, but it is not to be. He lands on Jena's toasted slice of bread. Unfortunately for him, Jena's dirty sole has colored him the same hue of the toast. As he lands, their is an extremely faint cracking sound of him landing on the brittle toast.

As Ben shakes his head to get himself oriented to his new surroundings, Jena reaches for the syrup bottle. Like most children her age, Jena has a sweet tooth and can hardly bare eating any food that doesn't have the satisfying taste of sugar on it. Ben looks up to see a strangely colored substance slowly making its way onto the center of the toast, exactly where he is located.

Dana turns around to see the young girl she is so fond of, putting the syrup on the toast. She shakes her head, thinking of the times she had as a child with a sweet tooth similar to Jena's, then again...
1112221111.title: Jena likes it sweet

choices: Dana wipes some off of Jena's face
11122211111.content:
Ben stares up at the giant Jena hesitantly. Her huge, pink hand hovers in the air with an upside-down syrup bottle cupped in it's sweaty palm. Before he can react, a small burst of air erupts from the syrup-encrusted nozzle, and Jena's stubby fingertips depress the sides of the bottle causing a long, gleaming rod of bronze ooze to descend directly at Ben!

There's no time to do anything but cower in fear as it falls steadily toward the platform of toast. Jena freely runs her tongue all around her lips and her eager eyes follow the long strip all-the-way-down...

Ben hops out of the way just as the tip of the syrup trail gently makes contact with the ragged surface of the bread and quickly starts to spill out toward the sides with silent malevolence. The toast crackles slightly as it moistens and buckles under the sheer weight of the ever-increasing pool. Ben stands idly for a moment and is startled as the encroaching syrup rushes forward with alarming speed and is suddenly filling the spaces around his feet! Jena continues to look on from above, a voracious grin fixed to her face, her huge eyes reflecting the golden beams emitting from her plate like glass. Her plump fingers do not lessen their grip on the bottle and the downpour continues relentlessly.

Ben tries to lift one foot out of the frigid goo but he's only able to lift it a couple of inches before it snaps back into the pool with a splash! The thick, eerily cold fluid holds him in place like glue and sends chills up his spine! In moments it's licking his knees and his legs feel like anvils. By the time he makes a move to slosh out of the way, Ben is so unable to move that he loses balance and tumbles face-first into the syrup pool!

Ben is nothing but squirming lump amid swarms of bubbles and the syrup has already begun to drip off the sides and onto the plate. Satisfied, Jena finally cuts off the sticky bottle and sets it back on the table. Smacking her lips, she licks her fingers one by one in anticipation.

The sound of Dana's toe ring tapping on the floor causes her turn around. Dana is standing behind her chair with a sweet smile and a small canister of cinnamon in her hand. She leans over Jena's shoulder, her blond hair draping over the child's shoulder, and starts to sprinkle it over the slab of toast.

"Back when I was your age, my mother showed me how to make toast even sweeter with this." Dana coos. Down below, Ben feels the cinnamon rain on his back like volcano ash.

"RUUAAAUUUUUURRRRGHHHH!!!!" He tries to claw the syrup out of his burning eyes, but the spice just sticks to him!

"MMMMMMmmmm, thank you, Aunt Dana!" Jena squeals with delight. Her eyes are nearly insane with hunger. But she must be polite. She waits patiently for Dana to set her own meal, a stacked BLT sandwich dripping with mayo, on the tabletop and sit down before she reaches a hand out for the toast in front of her. Dana looks on with nostalgic longing in her eyes and licks the corner of her mouth as she watches Jena's dangling fingers move toward the toast...
11122211111.title: Maple Syrup-Instrument of Destruction

choices: Jena takes a bite and Ben gets dripped off
111222111111.content:
Jena's fingers are thick enough to darken the sky without allowing much light to shine through the gaps between her plump joints. Only the nails still shimmer faintly as the giant digits wiggle their way at Ben.

The hand descends and cast a dark shadow like a horrible spider. Ben's limited courage is completely wiped out by the sight and he starts to sob while hopelessly slogging his way through the syrup that he's lying up to his shoulders in.

Jena's horrendously big thumb and forefinger form a pincer and lurch above the toast. They both clutch a corner and, with the trunks of her fat-laden fingers bulging, press into the sides of the bread. It takes less than an instant for the all-powerful muscles in Jena's fingers to cause the crusty edges to give. Flakes explode from the craters like the wake of a grenade and rain back down onto the plate.

Back in the giant world, these bus-sized digits were so round and tiny Jena could barely hold a baseball in one hand. Things have obviously changed as the rest of the fingers slither around Ben like tentacles and lift the huge tablet of bread up off the plate. Jena brings it first in front of the massive, round, flesh-colored donut that is her exposed midsection, quivering as it growls and snorts loudly for food, and then up, up up.

Ben arms feels like they're going to get pulled out of the sockets if her keeps trying to pull them out of this syrup. Defeated, he finally gives in weeps while watching Jena's towering form pass by. He stares up past his captor's chest where he can see her neckline and then her slight double-chin, getting deeper and more defined as her dimply smile broadens the closer Ben gets to her mouth.
111222111111.title: Doomed to be lunch?

choices: Ben falls someplace just as dangerous...
1112221111111.content:
Jena's hungry eyes appear from over her cheeks Ben is is lifted to her mouth. The bread is practically bending at the spin from the weight of all that syrup stirring around on it. Jena runs her tongue all the way across her lips, thinking about how it's going to taste when she wraps her mouth around all that...

Ben's heart stops the minute the sky is replaced by the looming visage of Jena mouth, grinning with menace. He's so he can see every pore on her face. Crouched and shoulder-deep in sludge that fills every nook and cranny, he pulls the locks or dripping hair out of his face and looks up at her. His whole body burning from head to toe, he realizes with a chill how much cinnamon is covering him. Tens of thousands of cinnamon grains litter the lake of syrup flowing against his body and must've been collecting on his skin all this time. In addition to the crap that was already sprinkled on him, Ben is now a human sticky sweet treat, and he looks like he'd taste pretty good going down.

Anxious to get away, Ben pulls the locks of sticky, syrup-dripping hair out his eyes and looks back up just in time to see Jena's thick pink lips smacking away at him. Above her mouth her little nostrils to flare open the second they catch a whiff of that warm, syrupy-sweet scent. Jena's can barely contain herself. Her cheeks swell with drool and her jaw drops, puling her mouth open in a sudden burst of hot air. The syrup covering the toast shimmers with a soft bronze glow, lighting up the layers of cinnamon covering the surface.

A chilling realization hits Ben as he stares up at the little giant's thick lips, smacking away at him. His skin is covered with a stinging, burning layer of gooey cinnamon that looks like it has to taste pretty good going down. The lake of syrup that's stirring, bubbling and dripping all around him shimmers with a bronze glow, not to mention all that powdered sweetness covering the surface. To Jena it must look irresistable...

The giant lips peel away and reveal pearly-white teeth parting open. The keen edges of her front teeth glow along with the dim glimmers coming from her molars in the dark corners of her maw.

Powerless to swim his way through the syrup swamp to safety, Ben desperately forces his aching muscles to carry him to the other side of the toast. Ropes of saliva dangle freely from the roof of Jena's mouth, fully exposed as she starts to push him him in. The shiny pink glob of Jena's uvula rises up to greet him, followed by a bumpy tongue that lurches like a cobra and rushes up suddenly in a wave. Ben screams and prays he's far enough away from her teeth to survive the first bite.

CHOMP!

The most horrendous sounds erupt as Jena's gigantic chompers crush their way through the slab of toast and a cause a geyser of syrup to gush out from between her lips. Ben is swiftly carried away by the syrup's current, swept toward the farthest edge of the toast before he can even react. He barely has time to look back over at Jena's mouth, her gooey lips pushed mid-bite into a creepily satisfied smile, before he feels himself tip backward and a moment later his legs are flying in the air as he is dripped off!
1112221111111.title: Near-chewed experience

choices: she licks him off her finger or Jena licks Dana's finger
she thinks he's a bug and wipes him on her pants
11122211111112.content:
Ben falls towards Jena's plate. He tries to scream but syrup fills his mouth and forces him to choke. He slams into the plate roughly. Ben opens his eyes thinking the fall must have surely crippled him. Luckily for Ben, a large amount of syrup that dripped off the toast broke his fall. Ben started to laugh, he couldn't believe the ups and downs he had been through today. He wanted it all to end, and he may get his wish. A huge shadow covers the entire plate. Ben looks up to see his mother Dana eyeing the glob of syrup he's encased in.

Dana reaches out with one mountainous finger and gets the entire glob onto it. Ben stares into his mother's eyes pleading with her to notice him.
11122211111112.title: syrup trap!

choices: Dana holds her finger up to Jena's mouth...
111222111111121.content:
The sight of Dana's long, grasping finger, with it's knife-like nail coming Ben's way, is nothing short of horrific. The finger bends like a cobra, it's fingertip curls toward him, he screams--!!

Dana's hungry eyes glow white from over her cheekbones down at the plate. Her tongue pokes out the corner of her mouth as the trunk of her finger scoops the syrup-encased Ben up.

Helpless to escape his sticky prison, Ben can do nothing but watch as she points her fingertip up and lifts him up, up, up, miles up off the table. Jena's eyes follow Dana's slender finger as she brings it to her chin. Although her face is dripping with scraps of her own meal, the little girl licks her lips and anxiously grips the tablecloth as if her appetite is hardly sated.

Dana glances over at her guest and notices the girl's fixated stare. It's adorable to watch, but her own stomach is rumbling low and deep. It could mean the difference between life and death whose hunger prevails...
