Ben ends up in his mother mouth
111222111112.content:
Jena picks up the syrup soaked piece of toast. She licks her lips in anticipation of the sweet treat. Ben looks up and sees the desire in her face. He had watched her eat several times before, but never realized how frightening it could be from this perspective. Jena opens her cavernous mouth and crunches down onto the sugary surface. Ben leaps backward and narrowly avoids the toothy onslaught.

A loud MMMMMMM escapes Jena's lips. Dana smiles, remembering a similar reaction she had as a child eating toast with syrup. Soon Jena takes another bite and another, until there is only one left. There is no where for Ben to run and a drop from his height onto the plate would be suicide yet better than being eaten. Ben tries to make his move, but the syrup has hardened, preventing his escape. Jena puts the piece into her mouth and begins to chew. Ben manages to escape the toast as its destroyed. Jena begins smacking her lips from the thick syrup and Ben makes a run for the opening between smacks. As the lips are about to close Ben barely makes it out and becomes stuck to Jena's lower lip.

Dana laughs at Jena's smacking, it reminds her of a dog eating peanut butter. Jena is so cute she thinks to herself, she can't resist giving her a big kiss...
111222111112.title: Kiss of death?

1112221111121.content:
A humiliating and horrific end. Ben, helplessly stuck both to Jena's lip and himself, can't begin to try and save his own hide at this point. His arms and fingers hopelessly stuck to his body and each other, he can't even grab onto something or climb anywhere.

Ben's ear is pressed hard against Jena's lower lip, the part between her mouth and her chin, that is flexing, stretching, and grinding him up and down as she rolls her jaw around. All the while the ear-splitting sounds of wild giggling are exploding from Jena's syrupy mouth just above him, her giant, chubby face pulled into gleeful, toothy laughter. Look upward at the monsterous, dimpled cheeks and strands of syrup hanging from the roof of the mouth as it cackles at your demise, or down at a staggering fall and certain death. These are Ben's choices now.

Adrenaline kicks into overdrive and Ben struggles like a fly caught in a web to free himself. His fingers covered in what might as well be superglue, he writhes and grits his teeth in an attempt to get them open, then screams as he manages to tear his cheek of of Jena's chin. He fights through the searing pain and his sprained neck to look around and--

Dana's wet, pink, pouting mouth are aimed hungrily toward his direction!!! His mother hot breath hits him first, then before he can think or react the massive face blocks out everything and his mother's lips part into a big, salivating "O".

Jena's smiles leaves her and she settles into an uncertain, breathless expression while Dana's hair scrapes across her head and shoulders. Her ooze-dripping mouth hesitantly remain open and waiting as Dana's thick lips envelop hers and Ben...

Ben screams as the two living walls press in on him, but his protests are quickly muffled as his mother's anaconda-lips peel open and slide onto Jena's sweet, sticky face with a slimy smack. Ben can press against them all he wants, but there's no delaying the inevitable and in an instant the fatal embrace is causing syrup to gush everywhere and fill every oriface, and the smothering flesh gives way to solid bone that is crushing his body, and there's no time to recognize the excruciating pain because before he knows it it's...
1112221111121.title: Mother's Last Kiss

choices: ...thrown toward the back of her tongue
1112221111122.content:
When Ben comes to, he finds himself fused onto Jena's bottom lip, possibly the worst place imaginable. The slimy pink lip stretches and contracts around him like fat worm.

Terrified of falling, he grabs onto the rubbery skin with all his might, listening to the wet smack of his fingers getting stuck to the lip like glue as he flails about helplessly.

With her dimpled cheeks stretched and bloated to capacity above, Jena wastes no time and starts chewing. A horrible, gut-wrenching sound rips Jena's face and into his ears as her mighty jaws begin to rend the slab of toast crammed in her mouth. Ben yelps in shocked surprise like a The girl's massive jaw pitches him up and down like a rag doll. Dangling precariously over certain doom, Ben desperately tries to claw his way up to the upper lip, which lies puckered and glistening just above him but...his hands are stuck!!

Jena shows no mercy. She chews her gooey mouthful like a cow, mashing her teeth together in a slow, clockwise motion while her stifled moans roar overhead. Ben watches in horror as Jena's mouth gnashes together, her plump cheek stretching even farther as syrup explodes from the toast with every chomp!

It isn't long before Jena's wet munching starts spurting syrup out the corners of her mouth. One by one, golden droplets spew down her cheeks, spilling down the sides of her mouth beside him. Ben can do nothing but stared wide-eyed as the syrup drops meld into a solid stream and come plummeting straight at him! "Gah!" Ben is completely coated in the downpour. The sickening sweet ooze clogs his nose every pour.

Ben's already weak stomach does flip flips from the constant pitching. Afraid of being sick, he peers over and sees Jena's chin, plump, round and pointing out over just beneath her lip, surrounded by a halo of fat that bulges along her face as she chews. If he can just get free, he can land on her chin and run to her shoulder for safety! But he's hopelessly stuck!

Suddenly, a woman's booming voice chuckles behind you--

"MMM...YOU ARE SUCH A DEAR..."

Ben shakes the syrup out of his eyes and turns around to see Dana leaning in her chair, smiling and pointing her semi-parted lips straight at him!!

There's a rush of hair and skin as Dana carries her massive face over to you. You hear her moist lips part, she exhales out her mouth and covers you in a musky, swamp-like cloud. Confronted by his humongous mom, Ben loses his voice and trembles uncontrollably. Doesn't matter, she'll never hear his pleas over Jena's gross slurping anyway. Dana's giant lips enfolds themselves over Jena's mouth, smearing across her syrup-covered chin and scooping both you and the syrup up in her monstrous embrace! "MMMMM..." she bellows. Jena loudly chokes down some of meal and her jaw goes slack as Dana's lips reach forward...

At the last minute, Ben finds his voice and screams like a little girl. "ACK! MOM, HELP ME!!" but it's too late. Her lips wrap firmly around Jena's mouth, carrying you up inside her maw an instant before they shut tightly against the girl's face and---

**SLLLLUUUURRRRPPP!**

Before he knows it, Ben is sucked inside his mother's broiling mouth and--
1112221111122.title: Mom, no!

choices: Dana feels something in her mouth...
11122211112.content:
Just as Jenna is about to lift the toast with Ben on it, she sees Dana staring longingly at her.
With a smile, she offers Dana a bite of her toast. "Why thank you Jenna, I was just thinking about the remarkable similarities the two of us have. I used to eat my toast with maple syrup too,"Ben hears his mom say.
"Anytime Aunt Dana, thanks for the toast..." Jenna says smiling.
Stuck under globs of the sweet substance, Ben stares in horror as the toast he is on is lifted up to his mom's face. He cant understand why someone who loves him so much would be doing this to him. His mother's pretty face comes into view in front of him and a slight double chin forms as her bus-sized lips part. Ben is in a state of shock as the lips that once used to consume him with kisses are about to consume him. Period.
Still stuck to the toast, he winces as a blast of his mother's hot, minty breath washes over him. Everything is getting darker as his view is only of the cavernous maw that is his mother's mouth. He can see all the way to the back of her throat due to the bright sunlight that is streaming through the windows. Ben closes his eyes and opens them again, wishing that this was all a dream.
Dana looks down at the sweet toast in her hand and raises it to her mouth. Inside, her saliva is building and she can hardly wait to sink her teeth into the tasty treat. "Ooo, am I going to pay for this, all those calories..."she thinks,"But I guess it's just once in awhile," she rationalises.
Ben starts to cry as his mother's jaws open wide to to recieve the meal. A single mettalic filling glints at the far end of her mouth. One bite later, and he is on his mother's tongue. She holds the bread there and lets her saliva dissolve the now crunchy coat of maple syrup on the toast. Ben starts to panic as waves of his mother's fetid saliva pass over him. Soon however, he is free of his bonds and leaps up and off the toast. He runs with all his might to the front of her mouth.
11122211112.title: Sweet treats...

111222111121.content:
Although he puts up a valiant effort to get out, Ben is too late. Dana gathers all the saliva in her mouth and swallows with one huge, audible gulp.
Ben slips on his mother's tongue and is sucked down with the rest of the food. He passes under her slimy uvula and slides all the way down her throat. With a soft plop, he lands inside Dana's belly. The smell of partially digested food assails his nostrils. After all that he has been through, he is really exhausted and he just slips back into the pile of partially digested food. He cant believe that his mom was single handedly responsible for the death of his siblings and now, he is about to encounter a similar fate. With loud sobs, he is digested slowly and soon the whole world doesnt seem to matter. At least he will be part of someone he loves...
111222111121.title: Bye-bye Ben

11122212.content:
Jena stops in front of the narrow wooden staircase leading up and lifts the foot carrying Ben over to it. Her arch presses into the edge of the step and leans into it, pushing the plush skin around her foot out and lowering her sole toward the dry, cracked surface. The flimsy stairstep immediately begins to crackle and bend under her terrifying weight.

CK..CK CK...CR-RC-CK GROOOOAAANNNN.....

Ben uses the last ounces of his strength to pull a bit of is upper body out of the immense wrinkles he's entwined in. As Jena's skin squishes out at the porous flesh gripping his ribs and legs start to tighten. Using his fingers to pry away the rolls of skin threatening to crush him, he can only stare dumbstruck at the oncoming wood that's about to smear him.

Jena just sighs and tilts her heel to lower her foot down. Her sole pancakes itself onto the step and she shifts her crushing bulk onto the foot, burying Ben in a sea of sweaty skin all over again. The world goes dark as Ben is stepped on HARD. Jena lifts her heel up off the step as she swings her other foot up to climb another, and Ben gets to experience every ounce of her oversized body bearing down on him. The stairs provide little cushioning even as they pop and buckle under the pressure.
11122212.title: Gah! No little girl!!

choices: Jena stops and scrapes him off
111222121.content:
Ben is reminded how the skin under a person's foot is unlike any found anywhere on the body. The branching wrinkles, the pockets between each tow, the grooves lining the thick, cushy layer of the sole; each part it's own unique texture and smell. In the space of mere moments, Ben has gotten reacquainted with these sensations to a point which no human before or since has ever experienced.

Like an avalanche of flesh, the giant foot of Jena has collapsed on top of his frail form and has placed it's entire center of gravity upon him. Every inch of tissue, every muscle is geared towards bearing down on the exact spot where Ben lies. The bubbles of swelling skin that enwrap themselves around his body and twist over his bones get firmer yet. The rough grooves of Jena's greasy skin dig into his face and he gags for air. All around him are the sounds of the step splintering against his ear, like the roar of a entire rainforest getting torn down.

Just as Ben is certain he won't survive another moment of being ground into oblivion by the continent-sized foot above him, the swelling flesh suddenly deflates with a burst of sour air and the flattened skin puffs back into it's original shape. Jena finally shifts her weight over to her to her other foot as she climbs to the next step. She lifts her heel far enough to peels her sole off the wood with a smack and the the wood slowly depressurizes back into place.

There's a hurl-inducing vertigo feeling as helpless Ben is flung back into the air again, and the vertigo gives way to heart-pounding shock as Jena's knee positions over yet another step and then drives her foot toward it with blinding speed.

WHAM! A dull, shattering crash of skin against wood as her foot touches down again. The rumble echoes through the stairs and the bones of her foot. Ben is pulverized by the instantaneous onslaught of pressure and chokes back the pain as he's driven back into the awful depths of the foot. Trickles of sweat squish in his ears as they drip through the tightening cracks in her sole.

The vicious cycle repeats itself over and over. Each time Jena's foot lands just so onto the creaky stairs so that the subtle distribution of weight doesn't kill him. If she were to make even the slightest wrong decision in where to lean on her foot, Ben would be without a doubt be totally squished. The fact doesn't escape him as time and time again he feels the wood under him barely hold Jena's foot up just enough that he isn't crushed. But the brutal climbing is taking it's toll. The higher Jena climbs the more gravity pulls on her body, and the heavier she gets until she finally becomes too much for Ben's body to handle and he becomes nothing but a red smear. Even now, Ben can feel his joint s and the sinew in his body beginning to give...he can't take much more pressure...
111222121.title: Die, Ben, Die

choices: It's not Dana. That's goo, right?
1112221211.content:
Jena feels something really big and sticky stuck in her foot that's clinging to the steps as she stomps. Agitated, she stops and balances herself on the walls of the staircase while lifting her ankle with her free hand.

Ben isn't aware of what is happening. The little girl's stomping was too much for him, and he blacked out just before the pressure of her plump body would have caused him to explode.

Jena lifts her foot as high as she can toward her face and leans over close to inspect it. Wiggling her toes, she squeezes her sole to see the black goo filling the soft crevices in the middle. She can't see Ben's body among the other trash stuffed in the many wrinkles and she scrunches her nose in disgust.

Ben's eyes start to weakly open from under the blanket of skin covering his nose and mouth. The cocoon of warm flesh now has a death grip on his entire body. His head feels like an elephant stepped on it and it hurts to breathe. Gleams of light pour under his lids and he starts to wake up when--

THUMP! Jena all of a sudden slams her little arch against the corner nearest step and starts to drag it down. Ben is aware of the fluctuating pressure in the skin around him and can't make out what's going on outside until the pulsating walls around cave in and he sees a giant slab of rotting wood coming at him!

The vast wrinkles covering Ben all peel out of the way and flatten around him, releasing his body and providing no protection from the scraping of the foot against the step. Before he can even shield himself he is painfully dragged against the edge of the step and is spurted out onto it! Everything spins out of control and he tumbles head over heels onto the ratty old step until he slows to a stop and crumples into a ball.

Although his whole body now reeks of foot odor, Ben is very aware of the release of presure on his aching body and he rolls onto his back. Looking up through half-closed lids he sees his former prison, Jena's filthy, wrinkly sole, hovering high above him, and past that Jena's leg hanging over the stairs, and her knee, and just over that Jena's face peering out from over it high off in the distance. Even from down here he can make out her curling her lip and mouthing the word "Gross". That's because Jena is looking at the gooey smear she left on the edge of the step, the same goo that is covering Ben and camouflaging him from sight. Ben rubs his eyes and thanks his lucky stars he's still alive. Even though he's tar black and smelly and covered in sticky yuckiness, it's the first time he's smiled since he was shrunken inthe first place.

His smile disappears real soon however, because the minute he starts to get up, a loud, hollow thud sends shiver down the stairs, follwed by another, and another...Ben turns around and looks up toward the top of the stairs, were a long, black shadow stretches into view down from the doorway at the top.
1112221211.title: Freedom and Suspense

choices: Freak out and jump on Jena's feet
You must be insane, but jump and grab Dana's
11122212111.content:
Huh? Who's there???

The shadow of someone gets larger and reaches all the way down the narrow staircase, and the vibrations rattle up Ben's spine.

He looks up and sees the toes on Jena's big foot recoil before she pulls the foot back. From over her stomach Jena's flaming-blond hair flip in the air as she turns her gaze away from Ben, pointing her plump in the direction of whomever's coming. She sets her foot back on the lower stair with a dull creak. The skin along her knees fold up as leans over and cranes her neck up to see.

The creaking gets closer, much heaver than Jena's was. Whoever it is must weigh more...a LOT more. The trembling continues and the hollow tremors follow one another, one by one, until the black outline of a person starts to emerge, a tall female with shoulder-length hair and a ponytail...

Jena exhales sharply and sighs with relief. "Aunt Dana, it's you!"

"NEARRGH!!" Shocked half to death, Ben stumbles back and cowers in terror. He would leap his way down the stairs in a heartbeat if not for the fat orange columns of Jena's legs fencing him in.

"Hi, honey." Dana answers. In moments her horrific, skyscraping form comes into view from over the steps above Ben's head. Ben can't believe his cruel luck! Just minutes after her last trampling bloodbath and she's back to finish him off!

Mom looks much the same as before, alarmingly high, head nearly invisible over her heaping chest and broad shoulders, eyes overshadowed by her hair and one corner of her mouth twisted into a sinister smile. Regardless of the proximity to Jena's fickle-minded feet, Ben rushes to the edge of the stair to get as far away from his mom as possible.

Dana's ankles crash onto the stair above him and quickly sink into the wood with a warbling groan. The long soles of her feet, now tainted with a light sheet of dust covering them, protrude off the stair from their arches and settle, hanging over him and spraying his body with specks of dirt. As they come to rest Ben can actually see the frail wooden step bending and caving in under her punishing weight. Coming to rest, Dana thoughtlessly flexes her toes at Ben, clasping the thick, boulder-shaped digits, grinding each blunt, bony end together. As Dana's leathery sole wrinkles, a small red blot or smear can be clearly seen on it. The smear is half-gone already, the red markings sunken into the ridges of the skin. Ben finds himself unable to breathe as he looks upon the last existing remains of his siblings.

Mortal fear grips cowardly Ben like a vice. Suddenly Dana and Jena's slithering feet and tapping toes have encircled Ben. Since both giants are standing on either side of him, they're both literally one step away from pontentially crushing him.

Jena's stubby fingers hold the soft bottom of Dana's delicate foot. Her thumbs enwrap themselves around the sides and she gently brings the it toward her. Ben shudders and clings tighter to the slick ring as the sky above is overtaken by the girl's face and mouth.

The whites of Jena's huge eyes peer down at Ben over her small mouse-like nose. Her pink, worm-like lips part slightly and expose the gleam of front teeth. Jena continues to guide the mother's shapely heel and arch toward her face. Ben shivers with fright as his vision is taken up by freckled skin and dimpled cheeks.

Ben feels the bones and muscles beneath him start to flex. The pillar-shaped toes suddenly begin to wiggle. Dana's toenails shimmer in the soft light with their movement. Jena's eyes widen, the metallic sheen of the toering reflecting in her iris. The scent of the flesh in her hands lingers upward and drifts into her nose, then into her mouth. She catches her breath as she the very back of her mouth begin to water...and before she or Ben knows it, her tiny nostrils flare and she sharply inhales.

"GAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHH!!"

Ben does somersaults in the air as his body is instantly lifted up with the force of a tornado. Nose hair and mucus strands whip against his body in a flurry. Before he can be fully inhaled into the mouth, he finds himself stuck in a webbing of both of them. Disgusting!

"SSNNNRRRUURRRRRCCKK!!"
The net of snot and hair that's entangled poor Ben starts to vibrate violently. Although he struggles, there's nothing he can do except wait for the giantess Jena to either...

Ben ran faster then he ever thought possible, he was determined to make it to somewhere safe. He couldn’t look back! However Jena’s monstrous height was too intense for Ben’s miniscule height. Ben could see a shadow engulph him, he ran faster and strained to move more but he just wasn’t fast enough.

All around him was black and gooey; it covered him in a tight mummy suite. He was totally immobile. In slow motion light broke the darkness and he could see himself raise from the floor. He could see the floor miles below him, and then quickly he approached and he was slammed against it with a painful and loud crashing sound. Then slowly the light broke through once more, he could see pink all around him, and ever time he moved the sticky monster that hold him only claimed him more. The painful process of Jena’s steps continued until only Ben’s left eye and nose was free of the blob like prison that was slowly eating him. It was soft…sticky and smelt like apple…it was chewing gum!

112.content:
It doesn't take long for the children to realize their predicament. Sara looks at Ben- Ben looks at Mike- and Mike turns his attention back toward them. Uh-oh....

--------

Dana sets the bucket down and looks about. The kids sure did leave this place in a mess. There were toys strewn about everywhere. In the center of the room she noticed what looked like a few computer chips scattered about an odd box. The kids must have been messing around with their father's things again. It would mean, at least, a days grounding for each of them. Sighing, she went to go pick up the mess before starting to scrub the place down.

--------

"Umm, guys. I think we may be in a little trouble." Ben had been cleverly named Captain Obvious for such statements in the past, and this time suited him as well as all the others.

"Well of course, were in trouble! Once Mom finds out that we broke that thing, we'll be grounded for sure!" Sara, the "intellectual" always looked at the results of her mistakes, after she'd made them, of course.

"Yeah, but I think it'd be a good idea to RUN THE HELL AWAY!" Mike, the leader, always looked to the present situation at hand.

"You said 'hell' I'm telling Mom!" Ben suddenly realized what he'd just said- and with that, the three of them looked back to see their giant mother approaching at a lighting fast speed. It was well past time to be going.

"Okay Ben," said Mike as he was bolting across the room. "There she is, why don't you tell her!"

"Not funny!"
112.title: The Giant Mom Maid

"RUN AWAY!", yelled Sarah when saw to her expression of horror a broom coming towards them. The children realize their mother is sweeping the basement before mopping it up.

Luckily, the children managed to dodged the broom, but their mother soon brought out the dust pan and then proceeded to sweep her children who had shrunk down to the dust pan and then dumped them in the trash bin in the basement.

"AAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH," screamed the children as they slide down from the dust pan that their mother who was an extremely beautiful blonde woman who was tall and slender and had true violet eyes, had brought to sweep the basement up to the trash bag of the trash bin of the basement.

The children landed in the trash bag of the trash bin of the basement safely when suddenly their mother dumped another batch of dust and crumbles and other dust-like stuff onto her children without her even knowing it. Then their mother dumped a second batch of trash onto them, which was some used toilet papers, dust bunnies, hair, used paper clips, and finally some spider webs with incest wings on them.

After that, their mother soon proceeded to mop up the basement while, unknowingly, her shrunken children were trapped in the trash bin of their parents' basement.

Ben suddenly starts to cry because their beautifully tanned blonde mother dumped them in a trash bin without her even knowing it.

"BE QUIET!", yelled Mike who was trying to think of a way to escape the trash bin.

While this was happening, their father called from upstairs,"Honey, can you throw away the trash from the basement?". "Yes I can, dear," said Dana, who had finished mopping and sweeping the basement floor. She went over to the trash bin and began to take the trash bag out of the trash bin.

When she was doing this, her children saw her huge amethyst violet eyes staring at them, yet she still do not know it. She was beginning to take the trash out. Her children were trying to get her attention, but failed.

Then she went upstairs with her children inside the trash bag in her hands.

1122.title: The  Spinning Ride

11221.content:
Mike and Ben look at each other, their faces agape with both shock and relief that their sister had had a soft landing, albiet within the mouth of her favourite stuffed animal. But they weren't out of danger just yet. Their enormous, giantess of a mother continued to clear the area, eventually taking out a sponge from the bucket of water nearby and scrubbing the floor clean, it really was conciderably dirty in here.

Sara sat quietly atop the soft, felt tongue of the stuffed lion, attempting in vain to try and locate her brothers, who she had last seen somewhere near the frisbee on the far side of the room. It seemed as though Mike and Ben had moved though, and that certainly wasn't a good thing. Had they abandoned her? Surely not, they wouldn't do that to their own sister, would they?

Dana soon finished scrubbing the room, only to hear footsteps coming from the floor above. It seemed Frank was back downstairs.
"Frank! Get down here will you!" she called.
Sara froze and looked over towards the staircase as the invenitable footfalls of her Giant father descended them, growing louder and louder until the monsterous, mountain of a man was now standing mere metres (at his scale) away from his bug-sized daughter. Frank was a tall, broad, and stunningly handsome man. In his younger days he had been the eye candy for many young men and women. His stunning good-looks, toned body, and charming demeanour made him a true find and perfect fit for the beautiful Dana, and a more than capable for father for his three children. He was also as intelligent as they came, a scientist with some great ideas and a mind like no other. Currently, he was a wearing a simple pair of grey bottoms, and a blue dress shirt and tie that was tucked into a brown leather belt around his waist.

"What is it hon?' Frank asked, kissing his wife on her forehead.
Dana sighed heavily. "Look at the mess the kids have made in here. I really don't understand why you let them play in here"
"They're just curious, that's all.' Frank smiled. "Say where are the kids anyway?"
"Hmm...oh I think they were playing outside. I'm sure Mike told me they were going to go visit my mother afterwards so we probably won't see them for a while"
"That's a shame, I was looking forward to showing Sara my new invention. Where's that thing got to anyway?”
11221.title: Dad descends

112211.content:
Having finished cleaning the floor, Dana kissed her husband on the cheek as she collected her cleaning utensils and left the basement. Frank meanwhile, was on the hunt for his latest invention, the Matter Minimizer, which he was sure he had left down here earlier that morning. It was a shame, he always enjoyed showing off his inventions to his children, particularly Sara, who was exceptionally bright for her age. As Frank heard Dana's footsteps up above, he began searching through the piles of toys she had gathered in the corner of the room, but soon realised that it wasn't there.

Sara sighed dreamily as she gazed up at her colossal mountainous father. She had always been his favourite daughter, and seeing him now, as an enormous giant, made her realise what a truly godly figure he was. She knew she could trust him, and after all, he had been the one to invent the matter minimizer in the first place, surely he would know how to restore her and her siblings size. Gathering up her courage, Sara carefully climbed out of the mouth of the stuffed lion and began to descend its furry pelt until she finally managed to jump off and land safely upon the cold, hard ground below. Taking a deep breath, she set off in the direction of her giant father, who remained blissfully unaware of her presense.

Meanwhile, Mike and Ben were hiding from their enormous father in the pile of collected toys, hoping to avoid his eye contact or risk getting killed by him, as their mother had almost done. Ben was being the most cowardly, and every time one of their fathers enormous, tree-like fingers came close, he would run off through the other toys, prompting Mike to chase after him. This had occured several times whilst Frank searched the pile, and on the final occassion, Ben had ran so far away that Mike was unable to locate him again. Left with very little option, Mike decided to leave the pile of toys.

Frank gave up looking for the matter minimizer, the box he had left in here was only a prototype anyway, with the newer version being kept upstairs in his private cupboard of inventions. Standing upright, he placed his hands upon his hips and took a loud yawn, he was feeling tired after a hard day working. He paused and looked out of the window at the far end of the basement, wondering what his children were up to. The enormous man didn't even notice as his tiny, bug-sized daughter ran across the basement floor in his direction. It didn't take her long to reach him, and immediately she began waving her arms and shouting up at her giant father, though naturally he couldn't hear her.

A moment later, Sara suddenly spotted Mike running out from the pile of toys in search of their younger brother. It turned out he didn't need to though, as seconds after this Ben came running out from behind. The three siblings hurried to meet up with each other, standing right beside their giant fathers enormous shoe, which at his current size was similar to a large rock formation. The siblings embraced each other, and sighed with relief that they were together once again. Sara took this opportunity to tell her siblings her plan to get Frank's attention.

Ben and Mike agreed, and the three siblings quickly banded together to call up to their father. Frank, of course, remaining oblivious to their pleas for help. He took another yawn and was prepared to leave the basement when he happened to notice his shoelace was untied. Crouching down, he quickly tied the thick laces together. Seeing this as their opportunity, the three siblings...
112211.title: The Matter Minimizer

1122111.content:
Since their calls for help were getting them no where, Mike took action and grabbed ahold of Sara and Ben. He dashed forward towards their fathers enormous hands, which were currently pre-occcupied tying his shoelaces together. The three siblings took a deep breath before leaping forward and each grabbing ahold of the shiny, golden watch that Frank wore upon his wrist. Their hands caught the golden strap, and they braced themselves as Frank finished adjusting his laces and stood upright once again. Crossing his arms around his beefy chest, Frank sighed and left the basement, ascending the staircase to the ground floor hallway.

The ride was intense for the children as their giant father walked, though fotunately, by having his arms crossed, they were not at risk of free flying elsewhere. Frank arrived upstairs and closed the door to the basement behind him. With nothing else to do today, and with the kids presumably off playing somewhere, he decided he may as well relax for the rest of the evening. Over the course of several minutes, the two brothers discussed their next course of action. At the end of the conversation, they decided it was most important to get to their mom, as she was vulnerable in the open while Sara was currently safe.

Ben and Mike began to trek towards where they last saw their mother. As they approached the general area, they noticed the massive size device which had shrunken all of them on the floor. After originally thinking it was broken, a quiet buzzing was emitting from the machine, indicating it was still somewhat active. After inspecting the giant device, they boys saw their mother on the floor crying.

"Mom!" the brothers yelled, and ran towards her. Despite their current situation, it was comforting to know that their loving mother was there with them.

"Ben! Mike!" their mother screamed as she embraced them. She broke down into tears some more, just being happy that her children were "okay." "Did that machine shrink you, too?"

"Yeah," Ben paused. "And Sara too."

Panic covered there mom's face. "Oh god, what happened? I didn't crush her did I?" Her face went white.

"No she's fine, she's over by her stuffed lion," Ben explained, opting not to tell her that their mother was the one who threw her there. She was going through enough right not, best not to let her know that.

"Do you think we can try to grow back, mommy?" asked Mike.

"Well, it's the best option we have right now honey," their mom replied, trying to sound calm.

As they walked over to the size device, the floor began to quake. Down the stairs walked the children's titanic father and husband of Dana, Frank. "Hello...", Frank's voice echoed throughout the basement. Dana, Ben and Mike looked up in awe at the family's patriarch.

The boys jumped up and down waving their hands. Trying to get their giant dad's attention. Dana realized this could be dangerous. "Boys, stop!" she screamed and grabbed them both.

"But mom," Mike whined.

"Shhhh," Dana sternly responded. "Your father loves you very much, but he might think you're a bug."

Meanwhile, Frank was confused as to why no one was in the basement. "Huh," Frank shrugged as he turned away.

What happens next?
112221.title: The device is their only hope, and their mom is...

1122211.content:
Frank turned to leave the room, but for some reason found himself compelled to stay. Maybe it was the absolute mess his kids had made of stuff on the floor. As he hesitated for a moment, debating whether or not to clean up his children's mess, his ant sized wife and two sons were trying to move across the floor to safety. Frank decided against cleaning up his kids mess. "BETTER LET THEM TAKE CARE OF THIS," he said, turning to leave. "MAYBE THATLL TEACH EM TO BE RESPONSIBLE."

However, as Frank turned to leave, he thought he saw a bit of movement out of the corner of his left eye on the floor. Turning his head, he took several earth shattering steps in that direction. He looked down with an annoyed expression and shook his head.

"Hey look, dad sees us!" Ben screamed at the top of his tiny lungs. Mike and Dana froze unsure of how to react.

Mike soon gave in the the joy and also started to scream and wave his arms. "We're saved," he yelled.

"Boys! Stop it and get back here now!" Dana scolded. She was much less enthusiastic, partly due to the disgusted expression on her God of a husband's face.

Dana ran and grabbed each boy by their arms and pulled them back. She held her breath in fear.

"UGH, WE'VE GOT ANTS UP HERE?" Frank muttered in annoyance. The boys heard this line and reality began to set in. Ben started to cry out of fear.

"Baby it's us!" Dana yelled, knowing it was pointless. She turned to her two sons. "Boys start running now!"

Dana turned back to face Frank as Mike and Ben fled behind her. She was willing to distract him so her boys could be safe.

Unfortunately, Frank was not falling for it. "WELL I BETTER TAKE CARE OF YOU THREE," he boomed

Frank proceeded to lower...
1122211.title: Dad's discovery

11222112.content:
Dana stood there, watching petrified with fear as Frank lowered his big, right hand down on top of her. She closed her eyes, preparing to be smashed to a pulp. Though terrified, she was willing to do this as long as her boys would escape.

However, Frank did not intend on smashing the “ants” with his hand. At least not yet. Rather, he soon lowered two thick fingers and plucked up his tiny wife.

Dana’s eyes snapped open as she realized what was happening. Was she spared? Had her husband realized it was her and he was going to help them?

“COME HERE YOU TWO,” Frank said as he plucked up the two fleeing children, placing them in the palm with Dana.

“Mom dad’s gonna save us!” Ben cheered.

Dana wrapped her arms around her two boys. “I sure hope so,” she said with a tear tricking down her face. However, the trio’s feeling of elation vanished with Frank’s next words.

“I GUESS IVE GOT THREE BUGS TO GET RID OF,” Frank said coldly, sending chills down his family members spines.

“Dad! It’s us!” Mike screamed and began waving his arms. He was soon joined by his mom.

“Frank please! You have to recognize us!” she screamed.

Frank just stared down at the bugs in his hand, uncaringly. His face twisted into a grin as he lowered his left hand down, and picked up his youngest son, Ben, between two fingers.

“Dad it’s me! Don’t hurt me!” Ben screamed. He was helpless as his father brought him up in front of his face.

“Frank no it’s out son! Don’t you dare hurt him!” Dana threatened.

Frank just shook his head. “WEL WHAT TO DO WITH YOU!” he laughed to himself.

Dana screamed and hugged Mike. She was helpless as she watched her giant husband do what to their youngest son?
11222112.title: His right hand

112221121.content:
Frank had a sadistic smirk draped across his face. “I KNOW JUST WHAT TO DO WITH YOU LITTLE BUGS,” he teased, and lifted his son ben above his mouth, dangling him above the vast cavern.

“Frank no that’s Ben!” Dana screamed from his hand, knowing deep down that her youngest son’s fate was already sealed.

“Dad don’t!” Ben screamed. It was no use. Frank simply let go of his sons body, and sent him plummeting onto his giant tongue. Before Ben could even scream, he felt the giant muscle send him back towards his father’s throat, where he descended down the wet esophagus.

“AHHHH,” Frank said, turning his attention to the two remaining “bugs” in his hand.

“Mom, dad just ate Ben,” sobbed Mike.

Dana didn’t know what to say. She just stood there in shock, her arms wrapped around her other son. She had just witnessed her husband eat their youngest child like he was nothing.

“WELL HE TASTED SO GOOD, I THINK ILL HAVE ANOTHER,” Frank laughed as he lowered his hand down towards his palm. His giant fingers plucked up his son, Mike.

“Put him down you fucking monster!” screamed Dana.

“Mommy make him stop!” Mike yelled through tears. He turned his head and saw his giant father’s lips, awaiting him as well.

“No! No dad don’t!” he yelled.

Frank smiled as he dropped his other son onto his tongue, and flung him towards the back of his mouth. Mike was drenched with saliva as he began his journey down the long tube towards his father’s stomach.

Frank patted his belly. “AND THEN THERE WAS ONE,” he said menacingly. Dana could only emit a low whimper as she was brought up to her husband’s giant face.

“I WONDER WHAT KIND OF ANTS YOU ARE,” Frank said inquisitively. This may have been a lucky break for Dana, as Frank does what...

1122211213.content:
“OH WELL. IT DOESN’T CONCERN ME.” The giant said. Dana started to cry as her husband licked his lips. She started to tremble as she watched the giant mouth open for her. The shrunken woman started to kick in fear. Frank either didn’t notice that the “bug” was panicking or just didn’t care.

“Please…stop this before it’s too late!” Dana yelled. Her husband let go, causing her to fall onto his tongue. As darkness started to surround her, the woman closed her eyes. She was being tasted and couldn’t bare to look. Frank soon swallowed her, causing Dana to scream.

As she traveled down the giant’s throat, she was terrified. Her worst fear right now wasn’t to being digested, it was to see her children digesting. Dana yelled as she entered the stomach and fell into the acids.

“I can’t believe it. I wanted to be with him for the rest of my life, but not like this.” She said to herself. As she looked around, she could see pieces of partially digested food. The stomach acids destroyed her clothes and burned her skin. She could tell she was getting weaker both physically and mentally.

The mother suddenly gasped as spotted Ben completely submerged. She quickly moved over to him and pulled him out. Dana held him closely and started crying as she realized Ben drowned.

“M…mom…” A voice said behind her. The mother turned around to see Mike was still alive but very weak. Still holding onto Ben, she moved over to her other son and pulled him in for a hug. Mike was hurt badly, but was at least glad he was with his mother in the end.

“I’m sorry. I’m so sorry.” Dana said softly. She knew she couldn’t save them, but wanted to end their suffering in some way. “Mike, do you trust me?” Her son nodded, having an idea of what she was about to do. “Okay, close your eyes and hold onto me.” Her son did as she asked, not questioning her. Dana gave him a kiss on the forehead, shaking a little. “I love you Mike.”

Dana held her sons tightly and closed her eyes before submerging them. It didn’t take long for Mike and his mother to pass out. With the last of her strength, Dana opened her eyes and saw her sons one last time.

“See…you…on…the…other……side.” Dana thought to herself before closing her eyes permanently.
———————————————

Sara was horrified and depressed. Though she couldn’t see everything from her position, her father’s movements and words made it very clear that he had devoured Sara’s siblings and mother. The girl flinched as the giant patted his belly. She sat quietly, imagining how horrible it must have been.

Dana stood there as her two sons fled behind her somewhere for safety. She was more than willing to do whatever it took to keep them safe. However, it soon dawned on her that Frank was reaching for something. When she saw what it was, her face lit up. “Ben! Michael! Get back her now!” she screamed as frank grabbed a magnifying glass and began to walk over towards her.

Turning around, both Ben and Mike couldn’t believe what they saw. They began to sprint back towards their shrunken mother, desperate for their giant father to recognize him.

All three shrinkees fell to the ground at the impact. Frank had kneeled down and the sheer force of his body had knocked them to the floor. “LETS SEE WHAT WE HAVE HERE,” he said and lifted the magnifying glass up.

The three tiny people on the floor began to yell and wave, praying their patriarch would recognize him. His giant eye watching them through the magnifying glass so widened in shock.

“OH MY GOD!” Frank yelled, causing everyone to grasp their ears. “DANA? BEN? MIKE?” Frank soon realized how loud his voice was to them. “What happened?” he whispered.

The miniaturized family members tried their best to explain everything but were too excited and only managed to talk over each other.

“Hang on, was this cause of the shrink ray?” Frank asked, soon realizing how stupid the question was.

Dana and the boys managed to signal to him that yes it was.

“Well it’s a good thing I found you three, I almost thought you were bugs and crushed you.” His words sent chills down their spines.

“Well I guess I better grow you all back,” Frank said, getting up and going to grab the shrink ray. What ends up happening?

1122212.content:
Ben, Mike, and Dana watch as their titanic husband and father ascends up the stairs and out of sight. "Phew," Dana said in relief. "Like I said boys, your father loves you but there's a good chance he won't recognize you at this size."

"Ok mom, we understand," Ben responded.

"Should we try to fix the shrinking machine?" asked Mike.

Dana glanced up at the machine. She did not realize her husband had built such a thing, much less knew how to repair it. "I guess," she sighed, as the three walked up to the machine which continued to emit a low buzz.

"Well, at least it sounds like there's still life in it, so that's good," Mike said.

Dana stared at the machine trying to think of her next move. "Yeah, it is. Why don't you two go over to the trigger and try to push it together. I'll stand here and you can try to shoot me."

The two brothers walked over to the trigger button on the machine while their mom stood where she guessed it would shoot out of. Hopefully she could return to normal then grow her boys back, and then carefully try to find Sara.

"Ok mom, we're ready!" Ben yelled out. Dana took a deep breathe and closed her eyes. Nothing. The boys were too small to pull the trigger.

"What's wrong boys? Nothing happened," Sara said nervously.

She heard the sound of one of her sons crying. "We're too small," Ben said as he sobbed.

At this point Dana lost it. She wanted to look strong for her sons but this was too much. Out of pure frustration she started yelling and kicking the machine. She hated it. She cursed and tried to take her anger out on the stupid device.

However, the remote was not as dead as she had originally thought. Unbeknownst to them, Frank had installed a killswitch specifically for situations such as this. Dana kicked the machine in just the right spot and it began to rattle. "What the hell?" Dana muttered. The machine shook and a bright light erupted out, growing who?

When Dana kicked the shrink ray, she had struck it in just the right spot. The machine started to rattle and a bright light erupted from it, firing out across the room. The beam targeted the area around a stuffed animal, exactly where the shrunken Sara was standing.

Sara screamed a s bright blue flash fired out towards her. She had no idea what was happening to her, but definitely felt her body changing. When Sara’s vision returned, she couldn’t believe it. She was standing at her normal size again. “Holy crap!” she yelled and scrunched her toes in excitement. She had dodged a bullet and had avoided death.

Her excitement was short lived as she remembered her brothers were still ant sized and on the floor. “Ben? Miley?” she called out, and carelessly started stomping towards the shrink ray.

“Kids run!” Dana screamed. Despite the fact that she loved her daughter, Sara was now a giant kaiju who could crush them with no effort. Ben, Mike and Dana all started to rub in separate directions. Bending down, Sara lifted up the shrinking device. She lifted her foot, but does she see anything below her?

Dana was disorientated, her head was swimming. What had she been doing? Why was she in here again? She couldn't remember... at first anyway.
As her mind cleared the events of today started slowly came back to her.

The shrink ray. Being tiny... and "Oh shit!" she shrieked "The kids!"

Dana started scanning the ground in search of her shrunken children. They had to be down there somewhere.
"Oh god... what if I've crushed them?" she cried and lowered herself down in an effort to see better.

Down bellow the kids gawked in awe at their gigantic mom. She was the most beautiful creature they'd ever see. To the tiny siblings, Dana was a goddess. A goddess that was desperately trying to find and rescue them. They had to help her spot them.

112222.content:
"If we reach the shrinking machine, this might all be over soon! And a few days from now, we'll all be laughing when we tell this story! Come on Ben, let's not be stupid, she's safe and we will turn her back before anything will happen.", Mike said, trying to convince his brother Ben.

That's when they heard a faint cry.

"Ben! Mike! Please help me!", little Sara pleaded from atop the "mountain".

His little sister crying for help was enough for Ben to start running towards her. Mike hesitated, but followed him regardless.

The huge box grew larger and larger, its shadow engulfed the ant sized siblings. It took several minutes before Ben was out of breath and in need of a break. He fell onto his knees, breathing heavily. Even Mike, being older and physically stronger, admitted defeat. They barely closed some distance.

"This... is... too much... We're too small. We... we should've gone for mom and the device. Now it'll take DAYS to get Sara and cross the entire room AGAIN!", Mike panted.

Ben, being close to tears by now, realized he might have made a mistake. But little did he know about the GIANT drama being about to unfold in their family home attic... and how his decision might have saved his life.

"HONEY!? YOU CALLED?"

The entire room shook when Frank yelled for his wife from down the stairs. The kids had to cover their ears immediately while Mike's knees gave in as well by the sudden wave of energy.

"DANA!?", the deep voice of Frank boomed up the stairs again. "DAMMIT, I COULD'VE SWORN SOMEONE CALLED MY NAME..."

Now the floor started to shake violently. BOOM BOOM BOOM

Frank was coming up the stairs, his heavy footsteps shaking his family's shrunken world to its foundations.

Suddenly, silence. The brothers had a second to regain balance and just managed to look at the entrance when the door opened with an unmatched force. The resulting shockwave send the two boys flying, further away from the former dad and now titan called Frank. Dana on the other hand wasn't so lucky...
The ant-size middle aged woman was knocked off her feet by her giant husband's sudden appearance. She hit the floor hard, receiving several bruises in the process, but was stopped moving further by one of the now huge toys she was trying to put away.

"Ow... oh my god, that hurt... what the fuck happened...?", she muttered to herself. She had already realized that she has shrunken down. But the sight of her mountainous husband left her speechless. How could a human the size of an ant possibly comprehend such a tremendous size difference?

Frank was a handsome man. That was undeniable. It was always surprising to people when they heard he was a scientist. No one seems to picture a "geek" being 6'6'' tall, lean and slightly muscular. And going by the size of his huge feet alone, he must have been an excellent lover, too... Him and Dana married young, and he's yet several years shy of turning 40.
Dana, still befuddled by hitting her head, remembered how people often confused him with the actor Colin Ferguson back in the day when the TV show Eureka was still popular. She looked up at her handsome, sloppy hubby and giggled.
He was getting ready for work, already wearing his unbuttoned dress shirt exposing his broad chest. His tie was loosely wrapped around his neck, waiting to be bound by Dana like always. Aside from that and his boxer briefs, he wore nothing. His long, hairy legs stretched out for miles. Dana strained her neck trying to follow them up. She wanted to make eye contact with him, but his gaze wasn't meant for something so insignificant as Dana, and she could only see his huge, manly chin from down below. All that was needed now were clouds covering his face and Frank could pass for the Colossus of Rhodes.. times 1000!
The only part of Frank being in Dana's limited reach were his rough, naked feet. Next to these mountains of bare flesh, Dana seemed to vanish into nothingness. She had to gulp. How the hell would she ever be able to make him notice her? And the smell... it was just too much. The strong odor of men's perfume mixed with the musky scent of an adult male reached her nose. And his feet... a nuanced composition of sweat, "insole" and sourness. She never realized how intense her sexy husband smelled. It was mesmerizing!

"DANA, HONEY, ARE YOU HERE? I CAN'T FIND MY SOCKS! DANA...?", he said and stopped when he realized she wasn't there. "HM STRANGE... AND WHY IS EVERYTHING SCATTERED ACROSS THE FLOOR?! THOSE DAMN KIDS!"


Suddenly, movement. Frank raised his mile long leg, ready to move a step forward. The shadow of his huge foot engulfed tiny Dana. She was able to get a glance at the full glory which is the underside of his bare foot: the pink flesh of his meaty sole was wrinkled and slightly callused at the points carrying his weight. Small crumbs of dirt got stuck to it, and even a small ant stuck to the ball of his foot, flattened beyond recognition. But the mangled body was so small that it disappeared among the other specks pressed into the fleshy landscape. The foot wasn't dirty, it was just that at her size Dana was able to witness this microcosmos of squished dots between folds of skin and cornea.
A sudden realization hit the minuscule woman that if she didn't get his attention soon, she will be a part of it, too!

BOOOOM

The foot crashed down. Dana didn't dare to open her eyes, still thinking she's about to be squashed like a bug. But she was lucky, the foot landed directly next to her and would've send her flying again if not for the toy. The smell was intensifying! In front of her was only - flesh. She was so insignificantly small that she wasn't even able to touch the "smooth" part of the foot's skin, only the part of the sole's skin which tends to grow up the lower edge of the foot. She had to think about the countless times she had to caress these monsters after a long day at the lab. She didn't mind, she liked satisfying all of Frank's desires. He also has his fair share of kinks, and he oftentimes talked her into kissing and licking his feet. He loved to have each of his toes sucked, and Dana loved to obey, that was her kink. But feet in general didn't interest her, and so this situation bore no pleasure for the shrunken mom.
She felt so helpless, so insignificant... her eyes got filled with tears. She gathered all of her strength and hit the thick wall of manfoot. She punched, and punched, and punched. Tears were now streaming down her cheeks as she realized that all her attempts were in vain. How can an ant be noticed by a man?!
That's when she heard Ben and Mike.

"Mom! It's us!!"

"Mom, you're ok! Get away from dad, this is too dangerous!"

Dana, shocked and relieved at the same time, began to sprint towards her sons. They were still some distance away, though...

She merely managed to run a few inches, when she saw her boys stopped dead in their tracks, looking up in shear horror. They began screaming for her, pointing upwards, and Dana slowly understood...
She stopped, too, turned around and looked up.
Her eyes met her husband's. This giant of a man was looking down, he was actually looking at her! A speck of a human!

Dana frantically waved with her arms.

"It's me, Frank! Honey! I love you! It's me I shrunk! Please help me! Plea.."

"UGH. WHAT HAVE WE HERE?! AN ANT? WE HAVE ANTS NOW?!", giant Frank interrupted her. He obviously didn't hear or recognize her. His dismissive attitude paired with that look of disgust on his face was defeating. Never had Dana felt so worthless and small in her life. Oh, the irony... Wife and husband, standing in front of each other but the husband mistakes the woman- for a bug!! A mere ant!

Dana fell to her knees, now begging to Frank. "Please oh please look closer! I love you so much, please don't mistake me for an insect! I beg you!"

But it was futile. A man doesn't waste more than a fleeting thought for an ant. His wife didn't like insects, and she sure as hell couldn't use ants infesting their home! The decision was made as soon as he noticed that tiny, moving dot. He wasn't angry at the ant, he wasn't happy to see it either. He simply didn't care for it. Nature made Frank big, gifted him with huge feet. And nature made ants small, so they can be squished by feet.

Ben and Mike held each other. They knew what was about to happen. Dad, being the man of the house, did it countless times. He is just getting rid of a pest, and it sure as hell wasn't the first nor the last one. He slightly lifted his bare foot over the poor "ant". Just a few inches, but for Dana it was still quite the distance. She was allowed to get a last glimpse of the underside of Frank's foot. Her last breaths were filled with his manly foot scent, and then... CRUNSH

Ben and Mike screamed in horror. "No, Dad, no! DAD!"

But if that wasn't enough, Dad started to twist hist giant foot, grinding whatever bug he stepped on into the floor and into his foot. For the kids, it was sickening to watch. Daddy squished mommy like a f*cking bug! And all because of that shrinking machine!

Reality hit all of the kids hard. They are nothing to their dad at this size, and he is most likely not going to help them. All they can do now is flee... and hope he doesn't continue his "spring cleaning"....
112222.title: Unintentional divorce

info.brief_description: Kids shrink in their own house and their parents don't know it! 3000 views so far
info.description:
A group of children Mike, Ben, and Sara find an invention of their father's in the basement. Little do they know its a shrinking machine. Their parents, Dana and Frank, do not know their children have shrunk. Keep the parents unaware of the children or if they are aware make it so they think the children are insects or dolls. Other than that, go wild. No one sentence chapters please.

Mike: 12 yrs old
Ben: 10 yrs old
Sara: 10 yrs old

Dana: 37
Frank: 40
